ftbquests.chapter.data.title: Cottage Witch
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.title: 新生魔艺
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests0.de: 作为一位新手，踏上旅程之前，你必须先获得一本&b破旧的笔记本&r，这可以在你的&b阿卡什宝典&r中找到，右击并选择正确的书籍即可。
若要将你的阿卡什宝典返回初始状态，&a拿着宝典对准空气&r时&a左击&r即可。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests1.ti: 获得一本初学者法术书
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests1.de: 为了获取&b初学者法术书&r，你必须将&6破旧的笔记本移除&r并和&b金锭&r一起在&b工作台&r合成。
如果想要在&b阿卡什宝典&r中取回你的&b破旧的笔记本&r，你需要&6在宝典中选择破旧的笔记本&r，然后&6潜行并扔出手上的书&r。这样你就可以将破旧的笔记本取回用于合成了。
这个名字看起来可能有些奇怪，这是正常的，你可以正常地使用它进行制作。
当你拥有了&b初学者法术书&r，你可以&6拿着他并按下C键&r打开界面。
顶部标签是&a破旧的笔记本，是你游玩这个模组的参考&r。下一个标签可以让你&a创建和保存法术&r。我们稍后会解决其余问题。
请注意，&d当你拿着你的书时，请不要按下 ` 键&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests2.de: 如果需要创建一个法术，你必须选择一个&a形态&r（触碰，自身，弹射物）和&a效果&r（伤害，破坏）。以上这些称为&b魔符&r，以后你可以解锁更多。
举个例子，你可以&6选择弹射物和破坏&r来拥有一个远程破坏方块的方法。在左下角输入&a法术名&r，然后在右下角点击&d制作&r按钮。这会把你的法术保存在&a第一个法术槽位&r（你一共拥有10个&a法术槽位&r。
通过将你的法术书持在你的主手或副手，并右键，你可以&6施放你的法术&r。&a用v选择你的法术&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests3.de: 你可以&a升级你的法术书&r来&a学习更高级的魔符&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests4.de: 终极魔法书！成为一位&a大法师&r并学习3级魔符！
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests5.ti: 获得至高木并制作一个紫水晶制法杖
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests5.su: 一个稀有树木和一个稀有宝石。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests5.de: 你的下一步是拥有一种任意种类的&a至高木&r。这些树罕见地出现在许多生物群系。
你可以用至高木来制作一个&a紫水晶法杖&r，这可以帮助你找到&b紫晶洞&r。这是一个很重要的魔法材料，所以尽量多收集一点！
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests6.su: 一个保存宇宙能量的地方
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests6.de: 像&a魔力灌注&r这样的魔法需要魔源，这是在所有生物中都有的力量。你也许需要制作一个&a魔源通道&r来收集它们，并制作一个&a魔源罐&r来保存它们。
但是我们该去哪里获得魔源？在自然界, 一种办法是从&b农艺魔源通道&r获取它，在你的牧场或农场中&6六格内放下你的魔源通道和魔源罐&r，就会缓慢地收集魔源。&d骨粉不会对魔源生产造成任何影响&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests7.de: &b灌注室&r是你创建&b魔源宝石&r的一种方法。只需在灌注室内&6放置一个紫水晶或青金石&r，然后待其缓慢转化即可。
稍后也可让其&a访问魔源（比如&b魔源罐&r中的魔源）&r来加快速度。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests8.su: 我可以向你解释，但墨水可能会稀释掉。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests8.de: 下一步是制作一个&b抄写台&r。你可以在抄写台上进行&a魔法制作&r，学得新魔符。
想要查看新的魔符，&6将你的法术书右键放在抄写台上&r。你可以使用右侧的标签来&按等级排序&r。找到你想要制作的符文并选择它。
选择魔符后，收集物品并&6将其丢到台上&r。抄写台匹配物品后，台上飘着的物品将会消失。
你可能需要一些&a称为“精华”的特殊物品&r。需要用到&b奥术基座&r，并在&b灌注室&r中制作。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests9.de: &b法术羊皮纸&r是一种将法术存储在纸上的方式。它是&a一次性的&r，需要在&b抄写台&r上将法术抄录至纸上。
首先，用纸和&b魔力纤维&r制作一个&b空白羊皮纸&r。然后，搭配上&b魔源宝石&r创造最终成品。
将羊皮纸放置在抄写台上后，&d在法术书中设定需要的法术&r，然后&6拿着法术书潜行右击抄写台&r，就可以将法术抄录到羊皮纸上。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests10.d: 在工作台上用奥术石制作一个&b奥术基座&r。
这些基座需要围绕&b灌注室&r或&b附魔装置&r放着。你可以做成“+”型或“x”型，两个都是可以的。
&6用JEI查询每个魔符的配方&r。只会消耗魔源宝石，所以不必担心昂贵的试剂。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests11.s: 这也是个不错的装饰方块
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests11.d: &b魔源石&r是魔法制作配方的一种材料。它可以在基本的&b工作台&r上制作，只需将&b魔源宝石&r放在中间，再围一圈&b任意种类的石头&r即可。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests12.d: 对于新手来说，我们可以制作一个&b魔符：收获&r。你也可以在&lJEI&r上查看，它需要一个&b铁锄&r和一个&b土之精华&r。
要想制作土之精华，你需要把你的&a奥术基座围着灌注室设置好&r。你需要&b泥土、种子和一个铁锭&r。&6再用每个试剂右击基座&r（顺序并不重要）。就位后，将&b魔源宝石&r放入灌注室。
如果一切正常，它就会开始制作！如果附近6格内有&b填充的魔源罐&r的话，制作就会变慢。
完成后，从灌注室中拿出来，然后&6把所有物品&r丢到你的抄写台上。接下来，拿下制作完成的&b魔符&r，并&6拿着它右击&r以解锁知识。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests13.s: 一个更神秘的制作方法
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests13.d: 若要继续，就需要一个&b附魔装置&r，将一个&b奥术核心&r放置在其下方，并把&b奥术底座&r围着它放置。
你可以把奥数核心埋在地下，也可以放在地上，并把基座也提高一格。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests14.t: 制作一个法师之花种子以获得纤维
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests14.d: &b法师之花&r是一种极具魔力的植物，无法在自然界中发现。你必须用&b附魔装置&r来制作它，它需要&b魔源宝石&r及&b种子&r。
&b将魔源宝石放置&r在四个基座上（顺序无所谓），然后在&6附魔装置上放置种子&r。
法师之花在很多配方中都有用到，但尤其是&b纤维&r极具价值，可以用它制作&a注魔的布匹以及法术羊皮纸&r。
&d不要忘记阅读你的法术书左上角标签中的文档！&r它比这些任务给的信息更多。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests15.s: 与女巫不同，法师要穿着裤子。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests15.d: 使用新得到的&b法师之花纤维&r去制作一套&b初学者法袍&r，它可以&a增加你可以获得的魔力&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests16.s: 药水罐、药水混合器和药水烧瓶
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests16.d: &b药水罐&r可以存储100瓶同种药水。
你可以用它来填充你的&b药水烧瓶&r，该容器可以存储8瓶同种药水。
药水烧瓶有两个变种：&a延长时效&r和&a强化&r。我想你应该猜的到都是干什么的。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests17.s: 将不同的药水效果混合到一瓶药水中去！
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests17.d: &b药水混合器&r允许你&a混合两种及以上的药水&r在一起。它从围绕在侧面的&b药水罐&r中提取药水，当&6提供魔源&r时，会输出到下方的罐子中。
一次只能使用两个药水罐，但是你可以&6在一个药水罐中填充混合过的药水&r，以添加更多的药水效果。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests18.d: 该盔甲可以给予你比基础套装更多的&a魔力&e。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests19.d: 最高级的盔甲，&b大法师套装&r几乎和&b下界合金&r一样好，但拥有巨额的&a魔力&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests20.d: &b施法法杖&r存储了一个单一法术用于施法。它自动以&a弹射物&r和&a加速&r魔符开头。
&6将它放在你的抄写台上&r，然后在你的法术书中创建你想要的法术。接着你可以拿着法术书&6潜行右击&r抄写台，将法术写入到法杖中。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests21.s: 你是在好奇这些饰品吗？
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests21.d: 要想制作魔法饰品，你需要先制作它们对应的平凡饰品。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests22.d: 尽管这个名字令人担忧，但这个饰品是正面的！&b不稳定礼物腰带&r会定期&a给你随机的正面药水效果&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests23.d: 可惜这并不是让你在村民的交易中打折的，&b节魔之戒&r（不论高等次等）都是让你的法术减少魔力消耗的。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests24.d: &b召唤之核心&r可以让你召唤的生物持续更长时间。
它还会&a攻击附近试图伤害召唤物的敌人&r，此外，玩家释放的&a以“自身”为目标的法术，会同时作用到附近的召唤物&r与玩家身上。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests25.d: 要继续下一步，你需要一个&b仪式火盆&r，它需要各种&b仪式之板&r才能工作。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests26.d: 这两种&b瓶子&r都有不同的效果。
&b湮灭之瓶&r会在捡起指定物品时湮灭它，换取魔力。对处理那些多余的圆石十分有用！&6潜行点击&r来开关它。&6在副手拿着物品并右击&r，可以把该物品添加到湮灭物品的列表中。
&b光之瓶&r会召唤一个跟随玩家的光源，也可以随时撤销。&6右击&r开关召唤。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests27.d: &e林地行者&r是被唤醒的至高木。要想执行此仪式，&6需要将仪式火盆放置在至高树旁边&r，并用石板&6右击&r它。最后&6右击仪式火盆&r开始。
&e林地行者&r会在召唤出来后漫无目的的走动，用&b支配之仗&6右击&r它，再右击一个方块，那个方块就会设为林地行者的&a家&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests28.s: 你知道我渴望仪式，老规矩了
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests28.d: 要想执行&a仪式&r，你需要一个执行的仪式所对应的&b石板&r。你可以查阅你的&a法术书文档&r了解每个仪式的作用。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests29.s: 要想成为大法师，你就必须要渡过这一难。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests29.d: 要想制作某些物品 你需要击败Boss——&e荒野奇美拉&r。它并不会自然生成，只能通过&a仪式&r召唤。
建议在对付该Boss前准备好二级盔甲与法术。
要召唤他，你需要先找到&e荒野猎手&r、&e荒野守卫者&r和&e荒野伏击者&r，并获得他们的&b战利品&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests30.s: 自然界中的自动机器与友善的伙伴
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests30.d: &e使魔&r是一种可以帮助你进行魔法工作的生物。他们与&e乌鸦&r的不同之处是，你如何遇见他和他们能做什么。
首先，你需要获得每个使魔对应的&b护符&r，做法不同，召唤的使魔不同。但在仪式开始之前，你需要先&6激活他们的护符&r。
你需要在使魔附近&6放置一个仪式火盆&r，再&6放入&b绑定之板&r。然后&6右击&r火盆，它会吸引&e使魔&r并制作&b绑定手稿&r，接下来你可以&6右击&r手稿来学习——之后，你就可以打开&a你的法术书的第三选项卡&r召唤使魔。
继续阅读，了解更多关于每种使魔的信息，包括使魔模式等。
你可以用&a解除&r法术来解绑你召唤的使魔，并&a取回护符&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests31.d: &b星宝石兽&r是一种小型的类似松鼠的生物，尤其喜欢&b金粒&r。找到一个野生的星宝石兽，并丢给它一个金粒，作为回报，它会返还你一个&b星宝石兽碎片&r，它可以用来制作星宝石兽的&b护符&r。只需&6拿着护符右键地面&r，就可以召唤出驯服的星宝石兽。
&e星宝石兽&r跟随你时，会给予你&e速度 III&r。当喂给它金粒时，它会给你&a透视看到金矿脉&r的能力。
&e星宝石兽&r也能&a运输物品&r，只需用&b支配之杖&r右击指定的容器即可。它也会&a收获完全成熟的&b魔源浆果从&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests32.d: &e风转草&r看上去像一个生番茄做的直升飞机。找到一只野生的之后，可以&6在它附近种一棵树&r，由此来获得它的&b碎片&r，同样也可以用来制作它的&b护符&r！你可以&6拿着护符右击&r任意一朵小花来召唤它。
在使魔模式下，他们会&a减少一半土系法术的消耗&r。你吃下的食物也会给予你更多的饱食度。
当&e风转草&r绑定到它的花上时，&a会复制附近的&b有机物&r——树、花等等。但是需要给他们提供一个箱子和&b魔源&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests33.d: &e德格米&r是一种小型的长得像土地神的生物，带有鹿角，并且可以在野外找到。把&b荒野之角&r丢在它脚下，作为交换，它会给你一个&b德格米碎片&r，它也是用来制作它的&b护符&r的。拿着&6护符右击&b苔石&r。
当跟随你时，它会增加你的土系法术的伤害，并且增加&a掉落物&r。
多个&e德格米&r指定到一个&b石阵&r，他们会从附近10格内的&e生物&r上&a收获掉落物与经验宝石&r，而不需要制作处死装置。一次收获后，它会将物品放入附近的容器中，同时需要&a魔源&r充能，才能进行下一次收获。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests34.d: &e书龙&r是一种小型的飞行动物，就像一只飞龙一样，但是翅膀是书页做的。你可以用&b书龙护符&r（由&b铁&r、&b魔源宝石&r和&b一本书&r制成）&6潜行右击&b讲台&r来召唤它。在魔法完成后，书龙就会出现在你面前。
当跟随你时，&e书龙&r会&a降低你的法术消耗并增加你的法术伤害&r。
在绑定到讲台后，它会根据你给它的&b羊皮纸&r，&a在周围区域进行施法&r，它可以&a染色&r以进行颜色编码。只有在附近有填充的&b魔源罐&r才能施放法术。
&b条目仍在制作中&r，所以该任务暂时设为&a复选框&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests35.s: 世界上最可爱的工作台
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests35.d: 对着一个半血以下的女巫施放&a解除&r法术，可以获得&b薇克精的碎片&r。在你制作&b护符&r后，你可以手持它，&6右击&b炼药锅&6召唤&a薇克精&r。
当薇克精跟随你时，它会&a增加使用的药水的持续时间&r。他也可以将&a负面效果作用在敌人身上&r。
当薇克精绑定到炼药锅上后，它会&a自动合成你告诉它的物品或药水&r，它从附近的容器中抽取材料，并在接收到红石信号时暂停。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests36.d: 在提供&b羊皮纸&r、&b魔源&r和红石信号后，&b法术炮塔&r就可以施放&a触摸&r与&a弹射物&r法术。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests37.d: 这个模组所提供的，还有更多！&b符文&r、&b巫师的武器&r、&b魔源中继器&r等等！在你的&b法术书&r中查看文档，它可以帮助你学习更多知识。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests38.d: &b紫水晶傀儡&r可以在&b紫水晶母岩&r上，用&6启蒙仪式&r来召唤。
拿着碎片&6右击&r任一方块召唤&e紫水晶傀儡&r，然后可以用你的&b支配之杖&6设定它的家&r。
&e紫水晶傀儡&r会将紫水晶块转换为&b紫水晶母岩&r，加速&a紫水晶的生长&r，并且只要设定为家的方块是容器（例如箱子或木桶），就会&a收获紫水晶簇&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests39.d: &e塞壬&r可以在&a海洋群系&r找到，但概率较低，你只需要给他们最喜爱的零食——&a海泡菜&r，就能获得他们的&b碎片&r。
拿着&b塞壬护符&r右击海晶石以召唤它。如果给他&b海带&r或&b珊瑚&r，&e塞壬&r就会改变颜色。
只要提供了&b魔源&r，&b塞壬神坛&r会生成&a钓鱼的战利品&r。如果附近有很多水生植物和动物，&e塞壬&r生产的速度就会加快。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests40.d: 不像其它&b护符&r那样，&e烈焰加农&r并不需要&b碎片&r，相反它只需简单的制作。
&e烈焰加农&r会像&e林地行者&r一样&a保卫领土&r，向敌人发射自跟踪导弹。
你可以给它&b灵魂沙&r或&b岩浆块&r来改变它的外观。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests41.d: 每种&a至高树&r都会结对应的&b果实&r！你可以发现它们&a像可可豆一样长在树上&r。
&b堡垒果&r长自&a恼人至高树&r。食用时，他会给予你&a护盾&r药水效果，另一种形式的&a抗性提升&r。
&b霜木瓜&r长自&a奔流自高树&r。食用时，&a会让你逐渐冰冻&r。
&b门多山竹&r长自&a繁茂至高树&r。它会给予你&a康复&r药水效果，增加你从恢复生命的食物中恢复的血量。
&b炸弹石榴&r长自&a烈焰至高树&r。&d它的作用未知&r，因为记录这些信息的日记到此条目结束。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests42.d: &b生死魔源通道&r会在附近有&e动物&r时生成魔源，当动物&a繁殖、长大或死亡时&r，也会生成魔源。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests43.d: &b菌丝魔源通道&r从&a食物&r中生成&a魔源&r。给它美味佳肴，还你大量魔源。
它也会在附近的区域&a生成蘑菇&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests44.d: &b火山魔源通道&r会在提供&b热量&r时生产魔源，它会&d融化附近的方块&r，并生成&b熔岩睡莲&r。
把&b熔岩睡莲&r放置在熔岩或岩浆块上，可以改变它的颜色。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests45.d: &b炼金魔源通道&r会在提供&b药水&r时生成魔源。组合的药水越多，生成的魔源也就越多。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests46.d: 送给&e野生的星宝石兽&r一个&b金粒&r，看看会发生什么！
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests47.d: 尽管有护符控制，但&e星宝石兽&r并不是最顽强的生物，如果发生了什么不愉快的事，重新控制它们可能会很痛苦。
值得庆幸的是，&b星宝石兽存储卷轴&r可以&a保留它们的所有设置&r，只要确保在设置完成后，&6手持卷轴右击你的星宝石兽&r即可。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests48.d: &b法师套装&r有很多种选择…那我们该如何选择呢？其实，根本不用担心这些。
&b巫师兵械库&r是一个&a腰带饰品&r，可包含最多&a三套套装&r与&a快捷栏物品&r，供你在飞行中切换。
默认情况下，你&6按0&r可以拿出一套套装，但&d你需要先穿着装备加载军械库&r。
首先，&6装备好你的长袍，设置好你的快捷栏&r。然后打开放射菜单，并&6选择一个槽位&r来存储套装。接着再次打开放射菜单，&6切换到不同槽位&r。装备上你的第二套套装，然后&6重复上一步操作&r，直到三个槽位都存储好套装。现在，你可以用放射菜单，&a在这些套装中快速切换&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests49.t: 星宝石兽也能运输流体！
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests49.d: 给你的&e星宝石兽&r装备一个&b星宝石储罐&r，可以让它&a往返运输流体&r。你也许希望把流体存储在&b流体罐&r中。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests50.d: &e星宝石兽&r可以使用&b书龙学位证&r来学习&e书龙&r的课程，现在它们已经足够聪明，可以在&a方块的指定面进行操作&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests51.d: &b星宝石垃圾桶&r可以让你的&a星宝石兽销毁它捡到的物品&r。一定先确保设定好过滤器。
你可以通过&6物品卷轴：允许/禁止&r来设定过滤器，然后用它&6点击你的星宝石兽&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests52.d: 尽管它缺乏打磨，但&b星宝石鞍&r可以让你做我们都梦寐以求的事情：&a骑上一只巨大的星宝石兽&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests53.d: 可以将&a一个法术绑定到&b一个施法水晶&r上去，然后你就可以将它&6装备到饰品栏上&r，之后就可以通过快捷键来存取绑定的法术。
你最多可以&a装备三个水晶&r，默认的存取快捷键是&6Ctrl+1-3&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests55.d: 你知道&e亡灵生物&r对&a剧毒孢子&r和&a生长&r法术很敏感吗？你应该找个时间测一下。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests56.d: &b空之编织块&r可以&a模仿天空的样子&r，所以你甚至可以在地底下看见阳光。
ftbquests.chapter.building__decorating.q: 获得一个进度展示框
炫耀一下吧
&b进度展示框&r是一个可以展示你进度的物品！将展示框放在你的展厅里，只需简单的&6右击&r他即可选择一项进度来展示。
思如泉涌
&lFantasy的家具&r加入了很多美丽又精致的家具来供你装饰。
合成系统和平时稍微有点不同。比如每个配方只需要花费1个&b黏土、圆石和木板&r，且必须在&b家具加工台&b制作。它可以在&a锻造台&a使用&b工作台&r和&b皮革&r合成。
小帮手（1）
建筑小帮手与更替小帮手
&b建筑小帮手&r可以帮助你更快地建造大型建筑。它可以一次从物品栏获取并放置多个方块。潜行并右键一个方块，将其设置为建造方块。
&b更替小帮手&r是一种可以用你&a物品栏指定的方块来更换世界中的方块&r的工具。和建筑小帮手一样，先&6潜行右击指定替换后的方块&r，然后你就可以直接&6右击&r使用小工具进行工作了。
小帮手（2）
复制粘贴，但是是建筑
&b复制粘贴小帮手&r是一个复杂而又强大的工具。这可以让你自动搭建&a在网络上找到的结构&r，当然也可以-可能你已经猜到了-&a复制粘贴那些你搭建过的结构&r。
为了使用它，你需要准备&b纸&r和&b模板管理器&r。
我不能在任务描述中放下所有的信息。 &o更多信息请见Youtube上Direwolf20的视频”Mod Spotlight Building Gadgets v2“的8分12秒&r。（译注：国内无法正常访问Youtube）
删除！破坏！毁灭！
&b破坏小帮手&十分危险，使用它将&a彻底地移除方块&r。它一般用于清理建筑物的大面积区域中的方块。
不要吃黏膏
&b构建黏膏&r使你可以在没有方块的情况下建造一个形似的构建方块
当你粘贴一个结构的时候，如果你的建筑中有缺失的方块，但是还有剩余的&b黏膏&r，就会&a用同样的外观取代这个方块&r。当他被破坏时，它就会掉落&b构建黏膏&r。
&b黏膏容器&r可以装的黏膏可比你自己要多的多。
获得一个玻璃物品展示框
我被框住了！
像正常的展示框一样，这些&b玻璃物品展示框&r在没有物品时会拥有边框，但是在有物品放入后，他们的边框会&a变得不可见&r。
对着展示框&6放一个旗帜&r来展示它的图案吧。
获得一个抹泥铲
建筑师们的梦想
&b抹泥铲&r在你&6右击&r的时候会放置你快捷栏中的一个随机方块，这对你&a随机化你的建筑色调&r非常有帮助。
获得一个灯笼
我喜欢灯笼
灯笼现在可以被放置在墙上！多棒的一件事啊。
这里有两种&b花箱&r。一种可以存放两朵花，另一种则可以存放三朵。
是时候使用地球上投了（这也许不好，我很抱歉）
在每个世界中，地球仪的外观都是独一无二的。当你和他互动或是给它一个红石信号时它就会开始旋转。
别把人放在这些台子上展示
和&b陈列柜&r相似，&b展示台&r是一个可以展示单个物品的方法。当然，你也可以把它堆叠起来做成一根柱子。
获得一个挂牌
它使我眼目一新
&b挂牌&r是一个多功能的装饰方块，可以挂在方块的上方或下方。
你可以用&a空手右击它&r来输入文字，或者你可以&a拿着一个物品右击它&r把它当做一个物品展示框来使用。
任意#supplementaries:hanging_signs
获得一个路标
指引你的方向
最多可以放置两个&b路标&r在任何栅栏方块上，以形成方向标志！
&6潜行右击&r放置的路标来扭转它的方向。
如果你&6拿着指南针右击它&r，它的方向将变成指南针所指向的地方。这对指向重生点或磁石的方向很有帮助！
任意#supplementaries:sign_posts
最后，你的校舍将会完成
在&b黑板&r上你可以绘制16x16的黑白图像。非常适合作为一个创意标牌！
这会在&a损坏时保留其图像&r，可以将他与&b水桶&r合成来清洗它。
自定义你的床
对普通的床感到平平无奇？做一个&a精致的&r床吧！为了制作精致的&b床&r，你需要一些木板、羊毛和&b一个垫子&r！
任意#handcrafted:fancy_beds
制作你的床
你的床可能稍显简陋。为什么不制作一个&b床单&r和&b垫子&r放在上面？这些可以被你&a喜欢的染料染色&r。
任意#handcrafted:cushions
任意#handcrafted:sheets
解锁战利品
获得荣耀
喜欢这个“狩猎小屋”的样子么？想要展示你最棒的一次狩猎？想让大家知道你真的很讨厌很讨厌&e山羊&r么？
那为什么不用这些&a吸引人的战利品来装饰你的房子&r呢。
（在这个任务中，只有某些动物被击杀才会被计算）
任意#handcrafted:trophies
动手装饰你的屋子
要开始制造&l精巧手艺模组&r的家具，你需要一些本模组中的&b木板&r。只需要&6把原版的木板扔到&b锯木机&r上即可获得。
你可以&6拿着&b锤子&r右击精巧手艺模组的方块来&a改变他们的外观&r。
任意#handcrafted:boards
多种装饰方法
&b床单&r和&b垫子&r并不是只能放在床上！
举个例子，拿着&b床单&6右击&r一张&b桌子&r使它成为一块&a桌布&r。
你也可以&a对&b椅子&r使用一个&b垫子&r来使&b椅子&r更加的舒适！为什么不看看其他你可以定制的东西呢...
任意#handcrafted:tables
任意#handcrafted:chairs
#powerscantparry
需要一次性清理大量的水么？为什么不尝试一下&b蛞蝓粘液块&r？它会&a吸收附近的水，将其转换为粘液&r。如果这个方块被移走的话，粘液也会被清除, 什么都不会留下。
&b充能站&r可以&a燃烧燃料为你的建筑小帮手充电&r。
ftbquests.chapter.collections.title: 收藏品
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests0.su: 红色代表热情，爱情，鲜血
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests0.de: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests1.su: 橙色代表健康，温暖，财富
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests1.de: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests2.su: 这首乐曲在我脑海中挥之不去！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests2.de: 获取所有的原版音乐唱片。
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests3.de: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests4.de: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests5.de: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests6.de: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests7.de: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests8.de: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests9.de: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests10.d: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests11.s: 真菌痴迷是一种病态吗？
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests11.d: 蘑菇真的超级超级酷的。为什么不试着收集所有种类呢？这样你就可以拥有一个美丽至极的蘑菇林了。
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests12.d: 在这个任务中，为了展示你对彩色的热爱，收集所有不同类型的羊毛。
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests13.d: 你能在游戏里驯服每一种猫吗？一共有十一种。祝你好运！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests14.d: 当你收集了所有的花朵，勾选这个框，就能得到&d终极奖励&r。
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests15.d: 为了获得这个奖励，你需要培育两对每种的原版动物！
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quests16.d: 收集游戏中的每一种花朵，赢取奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.title: 装备与武器
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests0.t: 给你的下界合金套装镀金
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests0.s: 全身都金闪闪的！裤子、头盔、胸甲还有…
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests0.d: 只是为了安抚&e猪灵&r而不得不把&b下界合金盔甲&r换成金甲实在是一件烦人的事。不过，以后就不再需要啦！
现在你可以在&b锻造台&r上用足够的金子&a给你的下界合金盔甲镀金&r，以安抚&e猪灵&r。
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests1.s: 说真的，这东西大概是游戏里最酷的物品
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests1.d: &b皮卡镖&r是一个可以&a远程破坏方块并把掉落物返还给你&r的工具。
它也可以用来&a捡起掉落物&r和&a攻击敌人&r。
你可以将它升级成&b界炎镖&r，这两种都可以被附魔。
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests2.d: &b龙鳞&r是极其宝贵的物品，可在&6再次&r击败末影龙时获得。可用于&a复制鞘翅&r。
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests3.d: 由死亡的&e烬壳龟&r制成，那是下界中的一种被动生物。这把剑很喜欢&b熔岩&r！
&6用这把剑右键点击熔岩&r充能，给它提供伤害加成和火焰附加！
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests4.d: 无论是夏至日还是一个普通的星期二，&b花冠&r都是所有性别的绝佳配饰。找到一些&e迷你莲&r，&6剪掉它们的花&r（不用担心！它们的花会重新长出来！）以获取这件超极迷人的装备的原料。
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests5.d: 你遇到&e蘑孢灵&r了吗？你知道你可以和它们交朋友，然后把它们背在背上到处走了吗？
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests6.s: 你也可以用生物捕捉器，但那有什么意思？
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests6.d: 你可以用&b网&r捕捉&e蜥蜴&r并把它放进你的物品栏！
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests7.s: 仙人掌为什么需要不死图腾？
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests7.d: 这本&b治疗法术书&r是一个&e仙人酋&r萨满创造的，这是一种栖居于沙漠之中的植物状物种，它们钟爱&b不死图腾&r。
用不死图腾和它们换取获得这个可重复使用的魔法书的机会。这是一个难得的机会，但如果你有多余的图腾……
如果你有幸获得了足够的治疗法术书，你可以&6将它们合成一本更强大的治疗法术书&r！这本书可以升到3级。
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests8.s: 我知道你在想什么，不，我没说
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests8.d: &e远古守卫者&r有时会掉落&b珍珠&r，可用于制作相当迷人的珠宝。
你也可以通过&6给&e水獭&r&6喂珍珠蚌&r来获取珍珠。
在河里&a钓鱼&r来获取珍珠蚌，然后&6把它扔在&e水獭&r旁边的&6地上&r，它们就会&a帮你打开&r。
它们在物品栏中时可提供&a巨大的增益效果&r，但&d不能当作饰品佩戴&r。
ftbquests.chapter.combat__gear.quests9.d: 为珍珠项链&6加一颗&b末影珍珠&r来升级到下一等级！
把你的项链升级到最终形态
要获得最高级的&b珍珠项链&r，你需要将2级项链与&b海洋之心&r融合。
&a大王乌贼&r是&e抹香鲸&r的天然猎物。当它们被这种捕食者攻击时，可能会掉落一根&b触手&r，可用于合成&b抓钩发射弩&r。

收获作物时偶尔获得&a双倍收成&r。

全套铁工具！取得进度的感觉真好，不是吗？恭喜！
获得一整套的&b铁装备&r。哈，它可比皮革好多了！
你知道&b钢叶工具&r在&a你合成他们的时候就附魔好了&r吗？这东西太酷了。
从&d暮色森林&r获得一整套的&b钢叶装备&r。

what's in the cards for you?

Although it is difficult to make, the &bTarot Deck&r will allow you to hold &aall your cards in a single slot&r, when &aequipped as a Curio&r.
The &bStink Ray&r can be used to create a disturbance among creatures. While passive mobs will flee the scent, &aneutral or hostile mobs will begin attacking the offending target&r.

&b背包&r可以被装备在&a饰品栏的“背饰”物品槽&r，然后&6按“B”键&r可以直接打开背包（默认）。
但你死亡时它能保留住额外的少量物品，并且&a保全你的装备&r。
它可以被&a附魔&r，而且外观也可以自定义！只需简单&6点击调色板按钮&r就可打开设置菜单。
通过浮动光标来&a查看解锁外观需要进行什么挑战&r。
注：虽然不止一个物品槽可以装备背包，但是&d只有“背饰”槽的背包是可以使用的（译注：指可用快捷键打开）&r！其他的背包不会生效，而且&d背包装备在通用物品槽一样不可用&r。
但你使用&r右击&r来装备背包是，将会被&d放置到错误的物品槽&r，所以请正确地装备它。
这面&b镜子&r不是一块普通的玻璃或银器。它除了可以反射附近的玩家，你还可以让它显示别的东西。
如果你拿一个&b盔甲夹&r再&6右击它&r，你就能用它来看&a装备的样子&r。

Add armor by &6right clicking&r the mirror while holding a piece of armor that the &dreflection is not already wearing&r. If it's wearing a helmet, and you add a helmet, it will &aequip the reflection's gear to you&r and add the second helmet to the reflection.
&6Right click with empty hand&r to switch armor sets. If you accidentally store more than one set of armor, you can &6cycle through these by shift-clicking&r.
You can also &6right click the mirror&r with a &bBanner&r to apply the banner pattern to the &abackground&r.
And, if you'd like a more spooky option, &6right click it&r with a &bSkull&r to change the preview to a &eSkeleton!&r.
Are you tired of the basic Luna Moth &bElytra&r and want to add some more &apizazz&r? &6Place it in a crafting grid&r and you'll get two separate wings from it.
Each &bWing&r can be crafted with &bDye&r or &bBanners&r to take on their appearance.
Be aware that &dModded banner patterns do not work&r!
Increases &amovement speed&r. Level up by &6traveling on foot!&r
Increases &aReach Distance&r. Level up by &6placing blocks&r!

The &bHealer's Pouch&r will periodically &agrant you a speed boost&r when you're hit by an enemy. You'll be faster the more hurt you are. Level it up by &6taking damage&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.title: 机械动力
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests0.title: 开始机械动力之旅
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests0.descrip: &l机械动力&r是一个令人难以置信且专注于低科技自动化和机械方面的模组。我觉得无需向你解释物理、科学和魔法之间密切关联性了吧？ 何不尝试一下&a科技巫术&r呢？机械动力与大多数模组有些区别，机械动力使用的基础能源是可以用多种方式产生的&a应力&r。
这个任务将会帮助你掌握机械动力的基础知识，而最终成果则完全取决于你以及你丰富的想象力！幸运的是，机械动力还提供了强大内置教学系统被称作&d思索&r，只需对着物品栏或者JEI&6的物品按住w键&r就能获取物品的使用信息。请务必确保光标未在文本框中！
首先，拿着这把&b扳手&r。你可以&6右击大部分机械动力的方块&r来旋转它们或者修改操作。&d并根据你所点击的那个面&r来决定旋转轴心位置。此外，你可以&6shift+右击&r大多数机械动力物品（或者一些原版物品，如拉杆和漏斗）&a就可以立即放入物品栏中&r。非常便捷！
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests1.title: 你的第一台机器
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests1.descrip: 你想要建造的第一台机器之一就是&b动力辊压机&r。动力辊压机可以辊压物品为类似于&b黄铜或铁板&r的金属板，这可能是你未来的计划中所需要的。
首先，制作一个&b手摇曲柄&r来给它提供应力。以后，你将会&a自动化你的应力&r，但在紧要关头，一些体力劳动也能起到同样的作用。
把&b铁锭&r放在&b动力辊压机&r下面。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests2.title: 更好的石头
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests2.descrip: &b安山岩&r是开始机械动力最基础的方块之一。虽然安山岩本身很坚硬，但是它并不具有延展性。所以最好是把它和&b铁&r混合在一起，用来制造一个更多功能的材料：&b安山合金&r。
用两个&b安山合金&r来制作&b传动杆&r（用来制作&b齿轮&r），并且可以用来加固去皮原木使之成为&b安山机壳&r。这些共同构成了这个模组中大多数合成配方的基础。
&6把护目镜装备于饰品栏&r就可以很容易地看到关于机械的&a细节信息&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests3.title: 获取传动杆
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests3.descrip: &b传动杆&r可以被用来传递&a应力&r，并且&b齿轮&r可以&6传递和操控&r应力。许多机器都有内置齿轮，这就需要外部&b齿轮&r来给他们动力。之后就能连接&b传动杆&r或者在侧面连接&b齿轮&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests4.descrip: 如前面所说的那样，&b齿轮&r可以&a传递和操控应力&r。
连接&b齿轮&r的方式非常简单：&b小齿轮&r有两种连接模式(即，连接在侧面以及连接在轴上)。&b大齿轮和小齿轮&r可以对角线连接，以及轴上连接。
如果你在对角连接的&b小齿轮&r的轴上再连接&b大齿轮&r，这将会&a增加旋转速度&r。可以如次&d堆叠多次&r，通过&6放置第二个小齿轮在大齿轮对角上&r，然后大齿轮放在轴上。如果你有空间就可以持续多次。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests5.descrip: 如前面所说的那样，&b齿轮&r可以&a传递和操控应力&r。
连接&b齿轮&r的方式非常简单：&b大齿轮&r垂直连接另一个，可以让你在没有&b齿轮箱&r（稍后会详细介绍）的情况下&a从水平转换为垂直旋转&r。&b大齿轮和小齿轮&r可以对角线连接，以及轴上连接。
&b大齿轮&r特别的有用，因为它们可以连接到&b转速控制器&r的顶部，可以让你&6自定义后面机器每分钟的旋转数-rpm-&r。
如果你在对角连接的&b小齿轮&r的轴上再连接&b大齿轮&r，这将会&a增加旋转速度&r。可以如次&d堆叠多次&r，通过&6放置第二个小齿轮在大齿轮对角上&r，然后大齿轮放在轴上。如果你有空间就可以持续多次。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests6.title: 旋转力：水
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests6.descrip: 在游戏早期产生应力需要使用水车，它们需要&a至少一格流动水方块&r才能发挥作用。任何额外的水方块&a都不会产生额外的应力或者提高转速&r。两种水车分别是标准&b水车&r和&b大型水车&r。标准的&b水车&r在&a8rpm&r的转速下固定产生&a256su&r的应力，而&b大型水车&r则是在&a4rpm&r的转速下固定产生&a512su&r的应力。
你可以在水车的中心连接像&b传动杆&r，&b齿轮&r，或者&b齿轮箱&r这样的物品，这使你可以将旋转力传递给其他的机器。
你也可以用一块&b木板&r去&6右击&r水车来改变水车的木制纹理。请记住，如果使用模组添加的木板&d可能会导致一些奇怪纹理&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests7.title: 旋转力：风
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests7.descrip: 游戏中期产生选择力的方法是使用风车。小型风车的建造相对容易，并且可以在以后进行扩展以产生更多的应力。
风车需要一个&b风车轴承&r，它可以&a面向任何方向&r放置。轴承的正面是粘性的，&6放置在上面的方块&r将成为风车的一部分。轴承的背面是传动杆可以连接的地方，用来传递风车的旋转力。
&d现在您有两个选项&r，使用&b风帆&r或&b羊毛&r作为“帆状”方块。
一旦您连接了8个或更多&b风帆&r或类似帆的方块，&6右击&b风车轴承&r以激活风车结构&r。&6按住右键同时观察轴承的侧面&r来配置风车的旋转方向。如果使用&b羊毛&r，您必须&6涂上强力胶将羊毛连接在一起&r，因为它们不会像风帆那样自动连接。
你可以将风车扩展到128个风帆/帆状方块，以&a16rpm&r的速度产生最大&a8192su&r的应力。任何额外的&b风帆&r或&b羊毛&r&a都不会产生更多的应力或转速&r。
其他非&b风帆&r或&b羊毛&r方块也可以连接到风车结构上。这些额外的方块不会影响风车的效率，所以可以随意装饰风车！
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests8.title: 应力：运动
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests8.descrip: 另一个应力源可以选择&b星宝石兽跑轮&r。事实证明，&e星宝石兽&r不仅仅喜欢收集和转移物品——它们还&a喜欢奔跑&r。
给它们一个&a水车来让它们在里面奔跑&r，并且它们能够产生的应力量为&d256 su&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests9.descrip: &b安山机壳&r是三种等级的机壳之一，用于合成各种各样的机器。对&b去皮原木&r使用&b安山合金&r来合成它。你可以&6手动的在地上放置&b去皮原木&r并且&6右击使用&b安山合金&r。你也可以用&b机械手&r自动完成。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests10.descri: 转动&b手摇曲柄&r一项饥饿的工作！快，在你晕过去之前把这个吃了。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests11.descri: 这个&b齿轮箱&r占据很小的空间帮助你通过&a一个正确的角度&r为2个或多个&b齿轮&r或者&b传动杆&r&a操控应力&r。
这个&b齿轮箱&r可以被&6旋转为水平或者垂直&r来帮助你&d转弯&r和&a改变方向&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests12.descri: 除其他方法外，&b齿轮箱&r可以让你&a反转旋转的方向&r，你需要通过在两个&b传动杆&r或者&b齿轮&r之间，并&6给它一个红石信号&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests13.descri: 恭喜你在工程方面完成的造诣！你已经做地非常好了，所以我们把这套盔甲作为奖励送给你。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests14.descri: 祝贺你操作了第一台机器！如果之前你感到害怕，希望你现在感觉更自信了。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests15.title: 应力的功率
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests15.descri: &a应力&r用于测量&d压力的单位，简称su&r。产生的应力越多，产生的su也就越多。每个机器都需要一定量的su来运作，如果你放置太多机器在一个应力网络中，你的系统就会变成&d超载&r状态。你可以通过&6佩戴护目镜&r来查看各个部分，但是我建议你合成一个&b应力表&r来连接到你的网络中。
应力表可以让你&a看到应力网络中最大的su和能维持需要多少su&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests16.title: 继续前进
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests16.descri: 这只是魔法工程方面你能做的基础。探索你自己的路，看看你可以合成什么样的&a秘密机械&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests17.descri: &b蒸汽引擎&r是另一个产生应力的方法，但是&a难度明显增加了&r并不推荐初期使用。
要了解如何为&b蒸汽引擎&r提供动力，以及如何&d升级输出&r，请在&6&lJEI&r&6搜索&r“蒸汽引擎”并&6按住“w”键思索&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests18.title: 混合然后合成
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests18.descri: &b动力搅拌器&r常用于多种用途，例如&a合成合金&r和&a自动合成不成型的配方&r。
It must be paired with a &bBasin&r, which holds the ingredients for it to mix.
让我们通过&d制作一些&b巧克力棒&r来测试它。
带着这些材料并且&6把你的盆放在热源上方&r。这应该是一桶&b融化的巧克力&r。你可以使用&b泵&r或者&b桶&r&6来提取它&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests19.title: 用烈焰人燃烧室加热
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests19.descri: 很多&b搅拌&r配方需要&a加热&r。你可以用&b营火&r作为普通的热源来处理特定的配方，但是很多配方需要&b烈焰人燃烧室&r来作为热源。
你需要合成一个&b空的烈焰人燃烧室&r，然后你需要&6找到一个&e烈焰人&6并且用右击它&r这样你就能获得&b烈焰人燃烧室&r。
&b烈焰人燃烧室&r必须&a喂食才能发挥作用&r。你可以通过&6用燃料右击它&r来喂食，例如&b原木&r、&b火把&r、&b烈焰棒&r和燃烧效率更高的：&b烈焰人蛋糕&r。你以后就能合成它，但是现在你就这一个。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests20.title: 通过辊压把液体转换为实体
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests20.descri: 现在你有了&b液体巧克力&r，你可能需要用&b动力辊压机&r&6把它辊压成巧克力棒&r。
在&b动力辊压机&r下放置&b工作盆&r并把液态巧克力&a泵入或用桶倒入&r至工作盆中。
在应力足够的情况下，&b动力辊压机&r自动地把液态巧克力辊压成&b巧克力棒&r，可以通过&6空手右击&r取出巧克力棒。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests21.title: Moving and Storing Fluids
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests21.descri: For certain recipes you may wish to use &bFluids&r, and for that you'll need &bTanks&r, &bPipes&r, and &bPumps&r.
To test it out, why not &dset up an infinite &bLava&d source&r? Set up a basic &aLava Generator&r with &bDripstone&r and a &bCauldron&r.
Then, place a &bPump&r and/or some &bFluid Pipes&r beside it, as well as a &bTank&r to hold the liquid. Power the pump and &6use the Wrench to change the Pump's direction&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests22.descri: 另一种重要的&a合金&r就是&b黄铜&r，由&b铜锭&r和&b锌锭&r混合而成。
合成这个你需要一个下面放置了&b烈焰人燃烧室&r的&b动力搅拌器&r。把材料放入搅拌器并&6给烈焰人燃烧室喂食&r，还要确保&b动力搅拌器&r有足够的应力才能进行搅拌。
你可以通过放置&b传送带&r来取出最终产物，或者通过&6空手右击&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests23.descri: &b玫瑰石英&r是一个有用且具有装饰功能的玻璃晶体。绝大多数情况下都是用于&b电子管&r，可以用来给&a“智能”机器&r充能的东西。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests24.descri: &b电子管&r是魔法科技的源头，可以让机器&a完成那些只有玩家才能完成的行为&r，例如：&b机械手&r可以使用很多工具：剪刀、桶、剑和其他别的。
&b电子管&r为&l机械动力的&r分拣机器提供了基础，或者其它需要实现&a智能功能&r的机器。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests25.descri: &b黄铜手部零件&r是用来合成&b机械手&r和&b伸缩机械手&r的零件，伸缩机械手可以&a增加你主手的触及范围&r。这非常额……非常有用，我可以看到我自己的手。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests26.descri: &b机械手&r经常用来自动合成&b机壳&r，或是合成&b精密构件&r，也可以用来&a模拟右击和左击&r。因为这样，所以使得&b机械手&r可以自动化&l新生魔艺&r做不到的。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests27.title: 运输物品
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests27.descri: &b传送带&r可以在机器和容器之间&a水平地或对角地&r传递物品。物品被放置在&b传送带&r上后将会粘在上面并且不会像掉落物一样。

&bChutes&r can transport items &avertically and diagonally&r. By default they transport downward, but &6hook them up to &bEncased Fans&r to change the direction. Unlike hoppers, they do not have a multi-slot inventory, and can transport multiple items at once.
You can learn more about how they work by &6holding w to Ponder&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests28.descri: &b精密构件&r通过用&b传送带&r和&b三个机械手&r合成。
你可以通过&lJEI&r来查看&d“序列组装”&r的合成顺序。
第一个机械手需要放置&b齿轮&r，第二个机械手放置&b大齿轮&r，而第三个机械手放置&b铁粒&r。每道工序需要&6重复进行5次&r。而且只要&d80%的几率获得&r最终产物。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests29.descri: &b转速控制器&r是一个可以&a增加，降低或者反转&r速度和旋转方向的机器。
&6把它放置下来并且连接其中一边&r来接入你的应力网络。然后，&6连上一个&b大齿轮&r就像图片展示的那样，并且&6之后的机器&r连接&b齿轮&r。
那些机器将会同步你在&a控制器设置的&r速度。&6用滚轮滚到负数则为反向&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests30.title: 玻璃机壳作为装饰
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests30.descri: 你可以通过结合既漂亮又实用且具有连接纹理的&b玻璃机壳&r来提升机械动力的机器。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests32.title: 除工作台以外的合成
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests32.descri: 是否还在为&a想要自动合成但是没有&e薇克精&r而烦恼？来试试&b动力合成器&r吧。
将它们设置为正确的方向，并为他们提供&a应力&r来让他们运作起来。您可以使用许多方式将物品放入其中——&b动力臂、漏斗、管道&r或是别的！
你需要使用&b扳手&r来确保&6物品的排列方向正确&r，以至于让它从&a一个口输出&r。这是它们工作所必需的。
这张图片只是一个你可以放置它们的形状的&a例子&r。你也可以做一个简单的3x3来处理大部分配方，但是&d在下一个任务中，您将需要上述设置&r。
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests33.title: Crushing Power
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests33.descri: One of the recipes that you can craft with your &bMechanical Crafters&r is the &bCrushing Wheel&r. A pair of these wheels will &aprocess raw ores and many other items&r, giving you access to &abonus items&r when compared with preparing them manually.
You'll also need them in your quest to &amake &bBlaze Cakes&r. Take this &bNetherrack&r and put it through the &bCrushers&r!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests34.title: Making The Crust
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests34.descri: &bBlaze Cakes&r begin with a crust, or &bBase&r. This is made by &acompacting &bCinder Flour&r with &bSugar&r and &ban Egg&r.
Use the &bCompactor&r setup you created earlier!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests35.title: Dispensing Fluids
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests35.descri: Now that you have a &bPump and Pipes&r, what do you do with the fluid?

Well, you have a few options. You could &acompact the fluid&r into solids using a &bMechanical Press&r (see the other quests for this!), or you could use a &bSpout&r to &adispense fluid onto or into items&r on a Depot.
Spouts can be used in making &bChocolate-Covered Berries&r, &bHoneyed Apples&r, &bSweet Rolls&r, and eventually also &bBlaze Cakes&r!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests36.title: 烤个蛋糕
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests36.subtit: 烤出一个漂亮的蛋糕易如反掌
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests36.descri: Using your &bSpout&r setup from earlier, you can &apipe lava into your &bBlaze Cake Base&r! The resulting &bBlaze Cake&r can be used to power &bBlaze Burners&r very significantly.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests37.title: 一个富有创意的烹饪方法
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests37.descri: 你想过有一个&a取之不尽的&b烈焰蛋糕&r吗？通常它只在创造模式才有可能，但现在你可以拿100个普通的&b烈焰蛋糕&r&6换取一个&r。
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.title: Culinary Arts
如果你喜欢凤梨可乐达
来一份&b热带炖菜&r，享受来自海滩的美味！正宗的蟹肉、洋葱加上椰壳盛的稻米——完美！
这个整合包的一大特性就是&a吃多种不同的食物可以提高你的生命上限&r！
你能通过检查你的&b食物清单&r知道你吃过哪些食物，它在你的&b阿卡什宝典&r，你可以&6拿着宝典右击然后选择食物清单&r来打开它。
You can also find what you've yet to eat by searching \"yet\" in the right side of your inventory screen (&lJEI&r).
&b茶&r是一种小灌木，你可以将其种植在耕地用来生产&b茶叶&r，然后将茶叶泡成&b茶&r。让我们再念一遍&b茶&r的名字。&b茶&r。
你需要做个&b水壶&r来泡茶，制作它需要一些&b皮革&r、&b桶&r和&b铜锭&r。
&b咖啡豆&r可以在下界的&a玄武岩三角洲&r找到。
什么，你惊讶咖啡为什么来自下界？你为什么会如此地想的好？
Rose hip tea will grant you a small amount of &aRegeneration&r!
Don't let it call your Cooking Pot black.
The &bKettle&r must be &6placed on a heat source&r in order to brew tea. You can use a &bcampfire&r, &bmagma block&r, or other source of warmth.
Use a &bwater bucket&r or 3 &bwater bottles&r to fill the &bkettle&r with water by &6right clicking them&r on the block. Then, &6right click&r and place your brewing ingredients inside!
Black tea is the leaf with the greatest amount of tannins, making it the most resistant to heat and also the most strongly-flavored.
Oh, it's also the most &aCaffeinated&r, and will grant you that effect.
Yellow tea, known to most as Oolong, is an earthier flavored tea with the &aability to grant resistance&r.
Green is for fresh, delicate, and delightful!
This tea is bright, grassy, and delicious! It also grants you the &aHaste&r effect.
Brew some delightful Dandelion Tea for a sunny afternoon picnic. It will grant you the &dComforting&r effect, which &akeeps you healing regardless of hunger&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests10: 做一些脓眼茶。喝下它，它使你变得虚弱，但是也会随机将一个已有的效果延长15秒。所以它好极了，不是吗？
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests11: I bet you're a really fun Gus

Much like Mushroom colonies, &bNether Fungus&r can be grown in &acomplete darkness&r using &bRich Soul Soil&r. If you &6harvest one with shears&r, you will get the whole colony. &6Harvest it with your hand&r and you will get up to 5 fungi. I've heard they're enjoyable to hang out with.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests12: Are you a trophy hunter? Well, look no further than this tasteful and bold decoration - the &bHoglin Mount&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests13: Soul Compost? Boy that's a mood
You can also use &bHoglin Hides&r to create Soul &bCompost&r, which will slowly convert into &bRich Soul Soil&r. Simply &6place the Compost near Lava&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests14: &bHoglin Hide&r can be used in cooking recipes, or cleaned on a &bCutting Board&r to create &bLeather&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests15: This moldy meat is frankly pretty gross. But if you want to complete all your quests, you &6need to make it&r. Bwahahaha.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests16: By killing &eHoglins&r with your trusty &bKnife&r, you can gain &bHoglin Loin&r, &bHoglin Hide&r, and sometimes &bHam&r! These can be used in cooking recipes.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests17: In order to obtain &bStrider Slices&r, you need to slay &eStriders&r with a &bKnife&r. It's quite tragic, really. But if you do so, you can &6cook them as they are&r, or place the Slices on the &bCutting Board&r to obtain &bGround Strider&r, which has further recipe uses.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests18: Make yourself a &bRaw Stuffed Hoglin&r and &6place it in a &bCooking Pot&r with 2 &bNether Salads&r to create a &bStuffed Hoglin&r, which can be placed down and eaten as the centerpiece of the most indulgent feast!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests19: &bPropelplants&r can be found in the Nether. They look similar to Bamboo, but are black in color, with glowing globules at the top. &dBe careful when harvesting them&r! You'll need &bShears&r to obtain the &bPropelpearls&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests20: This meal is deeply nourishing, but it never cools down no matter how much you blow on it.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests21: Are you Abel to get Cain?
&bPropelcane&r is obtained from &bPropelplants&r, but must be &6harvested with a Knife&r. It can be chopped into &bGunpowder&r at a Cutting Board, or used to &acreate special &bPropelplant Torches&r.
The &bCane&r can also be &aplanted on &bRich Soul Soil&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests22: He even carved the Roast Beast!
Before you can chow down on your &bStuffed Hoglin&r, you must first &6carve off the finest delicacy&r - the &bears&r. Delicious!
Then, you can &aobtain dishes&r from the remainder of the meal by &6clicking on the Hoglin with a bowl&r. Don't waste any!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests23: 这个模组的&b刀&r能保证&a从动物掉落额外的物品&r，例如&b羽毛&r或是&b皮革&r。同样的，&a当破坏玻璃时也会掉落额外的物品&r。这将会使你的农业发展得更轻松。
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests24: Despite the name, it's not for cooking pot.

The &bCooking Pot&r will allow you to make uniquely filling and delicious dishes! The more different foods you try, the &amore hearts you'll gain&r, making this an important tool for the kitchen witch adventurer.
将&b厨锅&r放在&b火&r、&b营火&r、&b岩浆快&r或&b炉灶&r等热源的上方，再加热它。然后&6把原料放进去&r。
你也要有东西来装做好的菜肴，比如&b碗&r、&b瓶子&r或是&b南瓜&r。
即使&b厨锅&r被破坏后，内容物也会被保留。
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests25: A &bStove&r is an incredibly useful tool. Thanks to your inherent magic, it is fueled at all times! You can &6place up to 6 food items&r on the grill in order to cook them. They'll pop up into items when they're ready! You can &6place an upside-down &bBasket&r above it to collect them automatically.
The &bStove&r can also be used as a heat source for the &bCooking Pot&r, but if you do it that way, you cannot place items on the grill.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests26: Yer barking up the wrong tree...heehee
&bBark&r is obtained by &6placing a log on a Cutting Board and right clicking with an Axe&r.
It can be used when making &bCompost&r, &bPaper&r, or even &abrewing Ale&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests27: Back to the ol' Cutting Board

A &bcutting board&r will allow you to prepare advanced ingredients for your meals, such as &bbacon&r or &bfish filets&r. Simply &6place the item on the cutting board&r and &6right click it&r with your knife.
This isn't the only use for the &bcutting board&r! Try experimenting with items like &bwooden logs&r (using an &baxe&r) or even unwanted &bleather armor&r (with &bshears&r)!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests28: Hmmm... Maybe YOU should try eating it... Go on...
&bDog food&r, and its companion, &bHorse Food&r, will grant potion effects to their users such as &aspeed&r, &aresistance&r, or &ajump boost&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests29: You can make &bPasta with Meatballs&r in a &bCooking Pot&r. Eating Full-Course meals, such as this one, will grant you the &aNourishing&r effect, which &aprevents you from losing hunger and saturation&r for a time. Helpful if you'll be going somewhere dangerous, as it will keep your health regenerating!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests30: &bHot Cocoa&r is made with &bBottled Milk&r. While &bBottled Milk&r will remove one effect from you, positive OR negative - &bHot Cocoa&r will &aonly remove negative effects&r! I always knew Swiss Miss knew what she was doing.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests31: Stuffed Pumpkin is the new cake
Some meals, like &bGlazed Ham&r or &bShepherd's Pie&r, need to be &6placed in world&r in order to eat them. They also make great decoration for your (visual) feasting pleasure!
You'll also need a &bbowl&r in order to eat them, so here, take this one.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests32: A classic meal for both depression and joy
With &bAcorns&r you can make &bNut Butter&r. Combine that with some fresh-reduced &bJelly&r and some &bBread&r and you've got yourself a nutritionally sound, delicious lunch.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests33: Ahh, there we are! The ultimate meal. Veggies, protein, dairy, grains...a balanced meal to tempt the tums.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests34: This quest exists purely so that when you make a &bS'more&r...you get some more!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests35: I'm not sure who pioneered the idea of eating &bEnder Pearls&r, but hey...why not?
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests36: Is it wrong to take carefully prepared, ceremonial-grade &bMatcha&r and then fill it with sugar and make it into a latte?
Well, if it is, then I don't wanna be right.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests37: 通往终极汉堡之路的第一步——不起眼的&b汉堡包&r。
The humbleburger, if you will. Hambumble? I don't know.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests38: Already twice as good by virtue of adding &bCheese&r, this burger could still be better...
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests39: Eat a bunch of cake! It's a delicious treat and you deserve it.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests40: Achieve this advancement by &6eating a course of every meal available&r! You can search for \"food\" in JEI or your storage, but &donly foods from the &lFarmer's Delight&r &dmod&r count.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests41: The &bSkillet&r allows you to cook on the go! Simply &6stand near a heat source&r and &6add your ingredients&r!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests42: 素食主义者？不必担心，我们已经考虑到了！为什么不做一些美味的&a素食&r呢？
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests43: There are many meals which can be &6placed down and eaten&r. Craft one of each and show your prowess as a kitchen witch.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests44: Who doesn't love pie? &6Make each type of pie and cake&r, and at the end you'll have a sumptuous feast!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests45: &bAzalea Tea&r is a delicious way to enjoy the beauty of the Azalea!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests47: Did you know that you can &aautomate your cooking with &lCreate&r? You can!
Right click the &bCooking Guide&r onto a &bBlaze Burner&r to &6create a Blaze Stove&r.
按住“w”来思索&b烹饪指南&r的更多信息。

Be sure that the &bCooking Guide&r is outside of your &bAkashic Tome&r! &dThe book will be consumed&r by this process. Check the &atutorial quests&r for info on removing a book from the &bAkashic Tome&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests48: Time to put that Keg to use! &bMead&r grants the effect &dSweetheart&r, which increases all incoming healing.
&bRice Wine&r gives &dSatisfaction&r, which causes Hunger to regen the same way Health does.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests49: To get your brewery started, you'll first need a &bKeg&r, and some &bTankards&r. Place the Tankards into the Keg with some &bWater&r and &aIngredients&r, such as Wheat for Beer, or Honey for Mead.
To get your brewery started, you'll first need a &bKeg&r, and some &bTankards&r. Place the Tankards into the Keg with some &bWater&r and &aIngredients&r, such as Wheat for Beer, or Honey for Mead.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests50: Place &bMagma Blocks&r around your &bKeg&r to raise the temperature and craft new brews! The more blocks you use, the higher the heat.
With this method, you can even craft &bCheeses&r and &bFudge&r.
You can also &acool down&r your &bKeg&r by placing &bIce Blocks&r around it instead! This will allow you to make things like &bPickles&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests51: Cheese can be created in the Keg, but must &abe aged before it can be eaten&r. Place the Cheese out to let it ripen.
Once it's ripe, you can place it on a &bCutting Board&r to obtain &bCheese Wedges&r to cook with.
&dWarning&r - the popup screen will say \\\"Fully Grown\\\" before the cheese is matured. Wait a little longer, until that text is gone.
You can also &aage cheese quickly&r with Create &6Haunting&r. Trauma causes the cheese to age prematurely. It also makes it &ldelicious&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests52: Have you ever had lasagna so good that it was frightening? Well, &awhat are you waiting for?&r
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests53: Served in a &bCauldron&r, this fanciful feast is &adevilishly good&r!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests54: In order to make &bFudge&r, your &bKeg&r will need to be at &amax heat&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests55: &bPickles&r need a &anice, cold&r Keg to marinate in.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests56: Once you've obtained a &bDragon Egg&r, you can use them to craft a &bNourishing Dragon Egg&r.
This item can only be cut with the &aextreme sharpness&r of a &bNether Star&r on a &bCutting Board&r. Cutting open the egg will give you &aseveral ingredients&r needed for high-level meals.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests57: To serve the unbridled taste sensation that is &adragon protein&r, you'll need an appropriate vessel.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests58: &bDragon Meat Stew&r... what could be a greater show of power than &cconsuming your fallen enemies&r?
Was that too much? That was too much, wasn't it?
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests59: This dreamy steamed dish will &afulfill your wildest dreams&r... or, at least, it'll &agive you some great buffs&r!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests60: Make this advancement by crafting the &bAssorted Salad&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests61: Congratulations, you've cooked some of the &amost magically imbued food&r in the game! Truly a kitchen witch of supreme renown!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests62: keep your feet on the ground
Possibly the &amost helpful item&r in the &cShulkren Forest&r, this tea helpfully &aclears the Levitation effect&r! You may want to make... a few...
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests63: Not a fan of red bean paste? Why not try &bChorus Fruit&r in your &bRice Cakes&r instead?
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests64: An uncommonly known fact is that &eShulkers&r are kind of like &bEggs&r! And, unsurprisingly, rather &ataste like them&r, too. As such, they make a delicious addition to your &abalanced diet&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests65: Although challenging to make, the &bDragon's Breath and Chorus Stew&r grants a number of effects that make it very worthwhile!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests66: &bLiquid Dragon Egg&r. Sounds appealing, doesn't it? You &ocould&r eat this as is...but why not &acook it first&r?
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests67: You can also &aadd Spices to your food&r! One such spice is &bVinegar&r, which is created by leaving &bSweet Berries&r to &arest in the Dolium&r with a &bFlower Pot&r.
Adding spices to your food &agives it greater saturation&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests68: The &bDolium&r is used for &aResting Conversion&r, which consists of placing your &aingredients and other items&r inside and &6letting them rest&r, for up to an &ain-game day&r.

Each recipe needs all ingredients, as well as a container to hold the result, and sometimes an additional item (such as &aAnvils for Gravy Boats&r). &dThe resting process will not begin without all components&r.
This can be sped up using the &bTime in a Bottle&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests69: &lCaupona&r is a cooking mod that employs a freeform style of recipe.
With most recipes, you will &amaintain a ratio&r of ingredients, such as ensuring that you have &a\"mostly beef\"&r and &a\"some vegetables\"&r, with &a\"no fish\"&r, and so on.
You can use &bthe guidebook&r or &lJEI&r to learn the recipes.
When viewing &bStews and Soups&r, ensure that you &6click these icons&r to access their recipes.
A) This is the &bSoup Base&r. For example, for &bNail Soup&r, you &6boil water&r.
B) This is the &aratio of ingredients to liquid&r. For example, 3 or more ingredients to 1 bucket/4 bowls of liquid.
C) This is the &aoutput&r, or what the recipe will make.
D) These are ingredients which &amust not be included&r.
E and F) These are the &aratio of items to each other&r, for example, a majority of &bbeef&r and at least one &bvegetable&r.
Now that you know how to read the recipes, let's make some!
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests70: The &bStove&r is a helpful and aesthetically-pleasing &aheat source&r, which can be used to heat &bStew Pots, Stir Fry Pans, and Hypocausts&r.
Strictly speaking, a &bStove&r is not the only &aheat source usable by the mod&r. However, it's very pretty.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests71: To stir-fry things, you'll need two things: a &bpan or stone&r, and a &bGravy Boat&r.
The Pan must be &6placed atop a heat source&r. The &bGravy Boat&r must be placed &adirectly next to the pan&r. You can place it with &6shift right click&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests72: A &bGravy Boat&r is crucial to making &aStir Fried dishes&r. It's crafted by &aresting&r, which is a unique mechanic involving &6putting things in a &bDolium&r and then &6leaving it the heck alone&r.

In this image, you can see there are &aat least 8 &bWalnuts&r, one &bAnvil&r, and one &bGlass Bottle&r (you can also use an empty Gravy Boat) in the &bDolium&r. All of these must be present in order for the &aresting process&r to begin. Be aware that this &dtakes a very long time&r. Most resting takes &dan in-game day&r to complete.
You can speed it up by using &bTime in a Bottle&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests73: To begin with, you'll need a &bClay Pot&r, which you'll need to &6fire in a furnace&r. A &bStew Pot&r is used to make &aSoups, Stews, and Aspics&r.
Once placed, you can &afill the Stew Pot&r by &6right clicking it&r with a &bBucket of Milk or Water&r, or &bBowls&r of whichever ingredient.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests74: Now that you're ready to cook, let's try making some &bBorscht&r. Just like babshka used to make.
As you can see, it's a &bBeetroot&r-heavy &avegetable soup&r, that doesn't have any &adenial ingredients&r.
Make sure you place &aat least 3 &bBeetroot&r and &aat least 1 &bother vegetable&r (or another &bBeetroot&r).
However, you can &dadd more than that&r! If you make it with &b9 Beetroot&r, it will give you &agreater saturation&r.
There is a &dbug where the correct Saturation won't appear&r when you hover over the item. However, it will be correct when you eat it.
Stews can also &abe placed down with &6shift + right click&r!
Additionally, you can &aadd &bPotions&a to your food&r by including them in the 9 ingredients.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests75: Soups will &aconvert to Aspic&r if left to sit in a &bStew Pot&r or &bDolium&r for long periods of time. This can be a good way of &astacking your stews&r, as &bBowls&r do not stack.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests76: In order to &athaw an &bAspic&r, you can either &6place it in a &bStew Pot&r and let it convert, or you can use a &bPortable Brazier&r.
The &bBrazier&r can be done while traveling, but it will require a &bBowl of Water&r and some &bVivid Charcoal&r in order to work.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests77: To test your Stir-Fry Skills, why not make some &bSauteed Roots&r? This dish is made with &aroot vegetables such as &bCarrots&r or &bPotatoes&r.
ftbquests.chapter.culinary_arts.quests78: To obtain a &bDragon Tooth&r, one must &6kill the &eEnder Dragon&6 with a &bKnife&r.
ftbquests.chapter.deeper_and_darker.ques: Go Deeper, Get Darker
Break on through to the Otherside

Would you like to explore the &cOtherside&r? It's a dark and dangerous dimension accessible only through the &dportal in Ancient Cities&r. To access it, you'll only need to &6kill the Warden&r. Should be an easy job, right? Of course!
First, you'll need to find yourself the &cAncient City&r, often signified by the presence of &bSculk&r.
Sculk Crafting
&bSculk&r is the signature block of the &cDeep Dark&r, a biome in which &cAncient Cities&r rest, occupied only by the Sculk and its associated creatures.
Where &bSculk&r comes from and what it does is not entirely known... but it is clear that it is &lalive&r.
Making More Sculk
a catalyst for greatness. or at least sculk.

Once you have obtained &bEcho Shards&r, you can produce your own &bSculk&r and &bSculk Veins&r by &6feeding exp to a &bSculk Catalyst&r, which will &atransform the surrounding blocks&r. The primary method of doing this is to &6slay monsters nearby&r.
Making the Sculk Sensor
potentially helpful for automation

&bSculk Sensors&r are cute - and mildly terrifying - beings which will &atransmit a redstone signal when alerted&r. They listen for nearby sounds, such as &afootsteps, blocks placing or breaking, or opening inventories&r.
You can &6block their listening with wool&r, directionally, or &6surround them with wool&r to deactivate them.
Defeat the Warden

The &eWarden&r pulls no punches. It is easily capable of killing the unprepared witch in a single hit, and it is &aincredibly sturdy&r. However, with the right preparation one might be able to face it!
The &eWarden&r is blind, and will seek out players by &asmell and hearing&r. If it does not detect any players for one minute, it will &aburrow back underground&r.
An Impossible Task
or is it?
With a &bWarden Spawn Egg&r, you should be able to &6insert it into a Spawner&r and &afight even more &eWardens&r.
Defeat 100 of them to win a &aprestigious &bArmor set&r and &bunique Head&r.
Explore the Otherside
The &cOtherside&r is a dark and dangerous place. It's likely you &awon't be able to see&r more than a few feet ahead of you.
Thankfully, the &bWarden Helmet&r will alleviate this issue.
Within the Otherside are &athree different biomes&r, each rather unwelcoming.
Craft a Warden Helmet
In order to brave the &cOtherside&r, you will want to be very geared up in general, but the piece of armor you'll need most is the &bWarden Helmet&r.
Aside from its defense and armor toughness, it grants &bimmunity to Darkness&r, allowing you to see.
You've found your way into an &bAncient City&r. Good luck adventurer, for here lie many treasures and equally many dangers.
&bAncient Vases&r are loot containers which can contain &bWarden Carapaces&r in rare instances. This may help you to &acraft the Warden Helmet&r before killing the &eWarden&r.
However, be wary, as &aeach time a Vase is broken&r, there is a chance to spawn &eThe Stalker&r, which is a relative of the &eWarden&r.
Clear Away the Sculk
In the &cheart of the Ancient City&r there is a &amassive portal&r. In order to use it, you must first &6clear away the &bSculk Veins&r.
Once it's clear, you can &6right click it&r with the &bHeart of the Deep&r to activate it.
Observe the Geyser
i'm gey ser
Encounter a &bGeyser&r, a block which will &aboost you into the air&r and &agrant you Slow Falling&r for a time.
Defeat the &eSculk Centipedes&r of the &cDeeplands&r to obtain &bSculk Bones&r.
\"But wait,\" I hear you said. \"Centipedes don't have bones!\"
To which I reply, \"&aThey do if they've eaten recently&r.\" Obtain these items from their bellies, as they are &aprecious indeed&r.
Obtain &bSoul Dust&d from the &eShattered&r in the &cEchoing Forest&r, a &bSoul Crystal&r from defeating &eStalkers&r, and &bSculk Bones&r from defeated &eSculk Centipedes&r.
Once you have these ingredients, you can convert your &bElytra&r to a &bSoul Elytra&r, which grants boosts randomly when you are midair, &anegating the need for many fireworks&r.
The Echoing Forest
According to the ancient texts:

This biome often generates in layers consisting of &bSculk, Sculk Stone, and Echo Soil&r. Echo trees populate the biome making The Otherside more vibrant with their purple leaves and &bSculk Gleam&r. The fog color in this biome is purple much like the leaves, and &athe only mobs that spawn here are &eShattered&r, which makes this biome a pleasant change from the many horrors of the Otherside Deeplands.
However, this area is &anot safe from the &eWarden&r.
The Overcast Columns
According to the ancient texts:

The &cOvercast Columns&r are a vast, uninhabited wasteland. They are composed of multiple amber columns, which have a biome-exclusive &bCrystallized Amber&r block in each of them. Overcast Columns also have multiple &bGeysers&r scattered throughout the terrain, which is composed of &bGloomslate&r and &bGloom Sculk&r. Nothing is known to live here due to the &ahostile and barren nature&r of the environment.
The Otherside Deeplands
According to the ancient texts:

The first biome is called &cOtherside Deeplands&r. The Deeplands are made up of mostly &bSculk&r and &bSculk Stone&r. Large groups of &ePhantoms&r can be seen flying around the caverns of this biome, along with hordes of &eSculk Snappers&r. &bSculk Jaws&r and &bInfested Sculk&r are very common in the Deeplands, making it more &adifficult to navigate&r. Beware of the &eShriekworms&r which lay beneath the &bInfested Sculk&r, waiting to strike.
The &eWarden&r can be summoned here, as well.
Discover the Ancient Temple
Within the &cOtherside Deeplands&r, one can find an &aAncient Temple&r. These structures are filled with the &aspoils of those who came before&r.
In the &dcenter of the temple&r, there are some blocks which, when broken, allow you to &6descend further into the Temple&r.
Hearts of Darkness
Don't ask me why, but I &aneed a bunch of &bHearts of the Deep&r. Trade them to me using this &arepeatable quest&r and I will give you some sculk-tastic rewards.
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.title: Beginnings
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.subtitle: a very good place to start
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests0.de: Congratulations on entering the Overworld for the first time! It's good to have you here. You can &6use these quests as a sort of guide&r to help you through mods you might not be familiar with!
This quest grants you an &bAkashic Tome&r, which contains guidebooks to mods in the pack.
It also gives you a &bSack&r, which is like a very poor &bShulker Box&r - but hey, it's better than nothing!
&lIf you ever lose your Akashic Tome&r, you can easily &6craft a new one&r with a &bBook&r and a &bStick&r.

Your most useful tool is &lJEI&r, a mod that appears on the right of your inventory screen. It will let you view all the items in the modpack, and their recipes. &6Please explore this to see what is on offer&r!
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests1.de: So, you died. It happens to us all, eventually! Don't worry, all your items are safe in a &agrave&r marking your last resting place.

You can use your &bGrave Finder&r to locate your last death, as well as the &aminimap marker&r that's automatically placed there. Then, &6right click on your grave&r to recover all your items and gear.
Your &aexperience&r, however, drops near your grave, so make sure to collect it!
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests2.de: Let's face it, sometimes you want to live somewhere cute right away. And in survival, you rarely have the resources to do so.
So, if you'd like a &aprefabricated starter house&r, then &6tick off this quest&r and &6redeem the reward&r. If not, you can safely ignore this! Both methods are perfectly valid. :)
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests3.de: Would you like a Mushroom Hat? Cool! Click the box above.
Be careful, because if you place it on the ground &dit will turn into a pumpkin&r. And it doesn't even need to be midnight.
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests4.de: Congratulations on cheating death! Sorry about your totem, though.
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests5.de: 50 deaths, and you're just getting started! Congrats...I guess? Anyway, here &6take this Totem&r, it seems like you need it.
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests6.de: Wow, you went a long while without dying! Nice work, buddy. Keep it up!
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests7.de: Need to get somewhere in a hurry? Why not try &aslinging&r? The &bSlime Sling&r, when &6pointed at the ground and drawn&r, will shoot the player in the opposite direction upon release. You can achieve &aquite a bit of air time&r this way! And the &bSlime Boots&r make it so you...you know...&adon't die from fall damage&r. A winning combination!
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests9.su: When you're away, your base will play
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests9.de: If you want your base to stay active even when you're not there, you want &achunk forceloading&r.
&6Press the '&r key (apostrophe) to access the &bOpen Parties and Claims&r menu. This will allow you to claim and/or forceload &athe chunk you're in&r.
Forceloading a chunk will &aensure that your base stays loaded when you're away&r. This is very hard on performance though, so do this &dsparingly&r!
When a chunk is claimed, &dother server members cannot break or interact with blocks in it&r. In order to grant someone access to your chunks, you need to &aadd them or their Party as an Ally&r.
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests10.d: &lOpen Parties and Claims&r allows you to add other players to your party, which can &aallow access to your claimed chunks&r.

You can create a party by typing &d/openpac-parties create&r. You can &achange all party settings&r in the main apostrophe menu. There are a ton of options to control griefing, protection, and access.
You can add a player as an &aAlly&r if you don't want to be on the same team. Type &d/openpac-parties ally add [username]&r.
There are TWO Parties mods in this modpack, due to reasons beyond the packmaker's control. :( I apologize for the confusion.
&lFTB Teams&r parties allow you to &ashare quest progress&r but do not affect claims.
&lOpen Parties&r parties allow you to &agrant acces to share claims&r, but do not affect quest progress.
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests11.d: This modpack adds a lot of new sounds. So to help you filter the ones you don't like, it also incl.udes &aSuper Sound Muffler&r.
&6Press F6 to open the menu&r. From here, you can click &aRecent&r to see what you've recently heard. You can play the sound to confirm it's the one you don't like, and then &6mute it!&r
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests12.d: 这个整合包有许多的建筑装饰相关的模组值得你研究。&d他们的大部分都与任务主线无关&r。

So how are you supposed to know they're there? Why, &lJEI&r of course. &6Opening your inventory&r will show you a wall of items to your right. You can search through these items at the bottom right. Type &d@&r and the name of a mod to search for only items from that mod.
For example, you can &asearch \"@another\"&r to view everything from Another Furniture. &6Left click the item&r to view its crafting recipe. &6Right click it&r to view what recipes it's used in.
This will let you view how to make anything in the game!
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests13.d: You might be wondering where all the quests are, when your screen looks like this:
See that &aarrow on the left bar&r? &6Hovering over that&r will show you all the categories.
Be sure to &6click the Pin in the upper right&r to keep this sidebar open permanently!
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests14.d: Did you know you can &apin quests&r so they &ashow on your main screen&r? You can!
Just &dbe warned that this overlaps your pinned Notes&r.
Also, perhaps I should mention that you can &apin notes&r to your screen as well! &6Press N to access your Notes menu&r.
ftbquests.chapter.exploration.quests15.d: To read a book in your &bAkashic Tome&r, &6right click&r while holding the book and &6select the book you want&r.
To &areturn the Akashic Tome&r to its regular form, &6hold it and left click in the air&r.
To &aremove a book from the tome&r, you need to &6crouch and throw&r the item (default keybind is Q).
To &aadd a book&r, you should &6craft the book with the &bTome&r.
ftbquests.chapter.farmers_delight.title: 农业与园艺
ftbquests.chapter.farmers_delight.quests: 获取一些种子
一些破烂
你已经获得了一些&b种子&r，恭喜你！ 成为一名成功农民的第一步是要有一些可以种植的种子。
作为奖励，试着将种子种植在&b沃土&r上。沃土通过&b有机肥料&r自然降解而成，非常适合种植作物！
它会对作物&a生长过程随机加速&r （只要附近有水），而且&a沃土耕地不会被踩踏退化回沃土&r 。它还可以在&a完全黑暗的环境中&b种植蘑菇&r 。
任意#forge:seeds
获得一个蘑菇菌落
在一起很开心
蘑菇菌落可以在&a黑暗环境的&r&b沃土&r上生长。如果你&6用剪刀采掘&r它，则会收获整个蘑菇菌落。如果你&6用手采掘&r它，则会掉落5个蘑菇。蘑菇万岁！
任意#forge:mushcolony
制作一个派
味道特别好，好吃到让一个男人吃了会哭
这个模组中的&b派&r有两种食用方式，你可以把它像&b蛋糕&r一样放在地上，然后一片一片的吃，或者可以把他们放在&b砧板&r上，用刀切成&b便捷的切片&r。
吃下它后，会获得一个短暂的速度提升。
获得草秆
不要拔短的那根
&b草秆&r可以用来制作&b绳子&r，这非常有用。它还可以用来制作&b粗布&r、&b有机肥料&r以及像&b粗灰泥&r的建筑材料。
粗布是一个很强大的东西
&b粗布&r是一种多功能材料，可以用于制作&b榻榻米垫&r和&b粗布告示牌&r等等东西！
获得绳子
绳索始终安全
&b绳索&r可用于制造诸如&b安全网&r之类的工具，落在安全网上时&a不会受到摔落伤害&r。它也可以被制作成&b绳索箭矢&r，箭落地之后，它将一段绳子展开至下方的地面，让你可以爬上去。
压实你的作物
压缩的作物
作物可以很轻松的装入袋子或箱子中，以便&a节省存储空间&r。&6将每种作物放入9个平铺到工作台中&r即可合成箱装作物或袋装作物！
获得新的作物
更多，给我更多
农夫乐事添加了4种新作物：&b番茄&r，&b稻米&r，&b卷心菜&r和&b洋葱&r。在探索时可以找到它们的野生版本，然后你可以将它们种植在家里的花园里！
丰硕作物
每个人都会喜欢胖乎乎的胡萝卜
在这个模组的作用下，作物会有小概率生变异成&a巨型作物&r，类似于星露谷物语中的效果。这种情况更有可能&a发生在被月光照耀的成熟作物上&r。
用&b锄&r破坏，会获得比平常更多的其对应作物。用&b斧&r或者用手直接破坏，会获得这个巨型作物。然后，你可以对他进行&a烹饪&r，&a剥皮&r ，或者将它们放在&b砧板&r上切开获得作物。
使用&b种植盆&r时，你有机会获得巨型作物！
&b沃土耕地&r会使作物生长成巨型作物的机率增加。
任意 #forge:overweightcrops
It's called fashion, sweaty, look it up
The &bStraw Hat&r can be bartered from &aFarmer Villagers&r. It will give you a bonus to plant growth and an extra chance at &aOverweight Crops&r!
It also gives a chance of breeding twins or triplets! ...of the animals. Not you. Probably.
Peel A Carrot
Peel your &bOverweight Crops&r to obtain different appearances, and gain &bVegetable Peels&r, which can be made into &bCompost&r or fed to &ePigs&r!
Peeled &bMelons&r can have their seeds removed with an &bAxe&r, and then juiced by &6right clicking them with a bottle&r.
Mmm, so planty
The &bPlanter&r is useful both as a decorative block, and as a utility. It can grow crops without the need for water, and without the danger of being trampled.
They say not to waste your diamonds on a hoe. But you've taken this a step further.
To honor your commitment, please take this reward.
Collect Chubby Crops
Gather &6one of each kind of &bOverweight Crop&r, which can be used as decoration, or &6cut on a &bCutting Board&r.
Ship Your Crops
Have you &6automated your farm&r? Then you probably know the pain of excessive crop ownership. &6Submit your crops to this quest&r to earn rewards.
[Repeatable Quest]
Sack Up
Similar to &bCrates&r, many crops can be compacted into &bSacks&r. These can be used decoratively, or &aused to free up storage space&r!

There's a way to &agrow crops more quickly!&r. If you &6craft some compost&r and then &6place it near a water source&r, it will slowly turn into &bRich Soil&r. This process can be &asped up using &bTime in a Bottle&r.
Once tilled, &bRich Soil&r will &agrant extra growth&r ticks to your plants. It also &acannot be trampled&r, and &adoes not require water&r.
You'll also want it if you're planning on growing any &bMushroom Colonies&r.
Much like its browner brother, &bRich Soul Soil&r is formed of &bSoil Compost&r that has been &aleft adjacent to Lava&r.
You can use it to grow &bNether Crops&r more quickly!
Obtain a Reaping Tool
don't fear the reaper...seriously
The &bReaping Tool&r, known in some circles as a Scythe, allows you to perform a finicky sort of magic known as &aReaping&r.

One &6right clicks&r with the &bScythe&r to reap an animal. If successful, you will &aobtain its drops without killing it&r, instead stealing its youth and transforming it into a baby. However, if you are unsuccessful, &anature takes its course&r.
You can ensure &abetter chances of success&r with &bbetter materials&r, with &bNetherite&r giving you a near 100% success rate. &6Hover and hold shift&r over each tool to see the base failure rate.
This ritual does not work on mobs with no baby stage, such as &eCod&r. It also does not work on &ehostile mobs&r, even if they DO have a baby stage.
If you &dreap a baby animal, it does die&r, so don't be greedy! Remember, the key to sustainable agriculture is to &aharvest responsibly&r.
&bReaping Tools&r can be used by &bDispensers&r.
Placing a &bReaping Tool&r into an &bEnchanting Table&r results in &dUnbreaking only, 99% of the time&r. It's better to enchant it with books.
&bReaping Tools&r can be enchanted with &aMending, Sharpness, and Unbreaking&r, as you might expect.
However, they can also be enchanted with &aExecutioner&r, which &dcurrently has no effect&r.
任意#forge:scythe
You know what's the spice of life? Variety. And you know who loves spice? You guessed it - &ebees&r.
Oh, that's not what you guessed?
Well, nevermind that. Collect one of each type of &bBeehive&r, and see how much your &eBees&r will appreciate it.
Craft a Cart
item and animal transport
These &bCarts&r are useful for transporting &aitems and entities&r. &6Press \"r\"&r by default when either mounted or on foot to &ahaul the cart&r. Press R again to set it down.

The &bSupply Cart&r is fairly self-explanatory. &6Shift right click the cart&r to access its inventory, and &aload it up with items&r! You can then transport those items over land. However, &abreaking the cart&r will drop its inventory.
The &bAnimal Cart&r will help you &atransport entities&r! &6Right click the cart item&r onto the creature you want to move. Then, haul as normal. &aBreak the cart&r to free the animal.
任意#forge:carts
ftbquests.chapter.fishing__gathering.que: Nether Fishing
The lava pools at the base of the &cNether&r are surprisingly full of life! Using a &bspecial Fishing Rod&r, you can &areel them in&r and enjoy the fruits of your labor!
Many of the fish can either be &acooked&r or &aprocessed into other byproducts&r. Use &lJEI&r to see what can be done with each fish!
I've Nether Fished So Well
a hellish rod
You can now &ago fishing in lava&r! Grab yourself a &bLava Fishing Rod&r and cast your line! You'll find you can catch some &areally interesting new fish&r.
Get a Fishing Rod
a fisher's life for me
To get started with &aFishing&r, every good witch needs a decent &brod&r. You can't go wrong with the traditional &bFishing Rod&r, but there are &amultiple options&r for you to choose from, now!
&6Hovering over each item&r will tell you more about what they do, and &lJEI&r can show you how to craft them!
These rods will &alevel up as you use them&r, and can even &abecome dynamically enchanted&r!
In addition, there are new treasures to be fished up, and new types of fish. So what are you waiting for? Get reelin'!
任意#forge:fishing_rods
Get Lucky

The &bLucky Pad&r is an item which can be &6applied to your Rod via the &bSmithing Table&r. Each time you do so, it grants you &aanother level of Luck&r on your rod, which increases your Rod's bonuses.
Basic Fish
Catch one each of the &abasic fish in vanilla&r!
珀耳塞福涅肯定会为你感到骄傲的！
A pomegranate branch brings undiscovered wealth or new riches to the owner. You can also use dried pomegranate skins in abundance incenses.

Write a question on a fig leaf to receive a divinatory answer. If the leaf dries out slowly, then the answer is yes. If it dries out quickly, it's no, or is a bad omen. I'm not sure how quickly fig leaves are supposed to dry, though.
A spell for curing toothache is to drive a nail into the trunk of a lime tree - but you must thank the lime tree first!
Cooking with Portobello mushrooms can be powerful magic if you are in need of emotional healing.
Historically, witches danced beneath the boughs of the walnut tree.

Historically, witches danced beneath the boughs of the walnut tree. It is also said that giving someone a bag of walnuts will make all their dreams come true. This works especially well if their dream was to own a bag of walnuts.
It is said that wolfberry allows for deep inner processing to happen without the need to consciously confront it.
Forage Wild Crops
Scattered around the world, you can find &bWild Crops&r growing.
Find all of them to build your &alovely witchy garden&r!
Did you know that corn hung over a mirror will bring good luck to your household?
Take a small white onion and stick it full of black-headed pins. When placed in the window, this will protect against negativity.
And carrots are said to promote... physical desire. *wink*
You can find &bEggplant&r in &cJungles&r, &bCucumber&r in &cSwamps&r, &bCorn&r in &cPlains&r, and &bAvocado&r in &cJungles&r.
Catch 500 Fish
If you truly wish to dedicate yourself to fishing, you may be rewarded. &6Catch 500 fish&r in order to complete this quest.
Deliver Fish
&bLucky Pads&r allow you to upgrade the luck on your &bFishing Rod&r. You can &aobtain more&r by trading in &bthe fish you've caught&r.
&dThis quest is repeatable&r.
Any #minecraft:fishes
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.title: Globetrotting
Witch of the Hidden Leaf Village

Is there much overlap between Ninjas and Witches? I'm not sure, but this armor is pretty cool, so why not stop asking questions and just do the quest, eh? Whippersnapper. Go &6climb 90,000cm&r to prove your worth.
Congratulations, you have opened 10 trapped chests! An achievement worth celebrating. Now heal up.
This quaint &cFisherman's Lodge&r is water-bound, and is a great place to go fishing.
The &cAncient Mines&r been to be seen to be believed. A massive underground chasm, once inhabited by those who delved too greedily and too deep. Beware what now lives there.
&dCW: Giant Cave Centipedes&r. Although they are disabled in most of the modpack, this structure has a spawner for them. Be prepared, should you go inside.
The &cPillager Fortress&r is best taken on with a group of friends. However, a particularly capable or tenacious witch could certainly try to go it alone.
To find the &cLabyrinth of the Serpent&r, you must purchase a map from a Villager.
Beware, though. Within lie many dangers, and even a final boss!
This world has a ton of different structures for you to encounter! Some are dangerous, others contain only &amild peril&r.
Most of them contain &ajuicy loot&r! Why not try to find all of them?
Locate the &cApothecary's Abode&r, a large structure filled with bizarre machines and absolutely loaded with &eIllagers&r.
Would your life be complete without visiting a &cWitch's Stump&r? No. Unfortunately the coven that makes their home there is an unfriendly one. But once you conquer them, you can use their items for your own purposes.
Climb the &cWizard's Tower&r and you may find what happened to its previous inhabitant. Also, beware of the basement.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests10: The best witches are those who are worldly. As such, &6prove your mettle by traversing all vanilla biomes&r!
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests12: Discover an &cEnchanting Tower&r, a small but cozy spire featuring a magical twist.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests13: The &bCastle&r is home to several friendly &eVillagers&r, and their ruler sits atop a throne of stone.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests14: Discover &cThe Catacombs&r, which are absolutely &acrawling with undead&r, but may have hidden treasures inside!
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests15: Find a &cFortress of the Undead&r, and survive!*
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests16: In certain forests, it's said that the trees are not only alive, but can speak! Seek one out for yourself.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests17: What an odd statue. Who made these, and for what purpose?
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests18: The beginning of your journey should bring you to a &cTower&r, looming over the surrounding lands. Found most often in plains, forests, and mountains, these Towers &ahold countless treasures&r, as well as a &bmap to the next dungeon...&r
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests19: There are &athree types&r of &cReanimated Ruins&r. Which one you complete will determine which &anew map you unlock&r. You only need to find one to complete this quest, but if you wish to &aobtain all the unique artifacts&r, you'll need to &6seek out more ruins&r!
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests20: The journals from which I discovered these dungeons had this to say: \"This &cancient skeleton&r can be found in &cdeserts&r and hides a secret beneath. Explore the ancient temple and &afind the treasures that rest within&r. Legend has it that this is where the &bLeviathan Blade&r resides. Along with treasure, the &ehusks&r that spawn here are &acapable of dropping &bsand&r with their normal loot.\"
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests21: not to be confused with shirley temple

The journals from which I discovered these dungeons had this to say: \"This &cabandoned temple of old&r has long since been taken over by &eStrays&r. At the top, you’ll find the &bFrosted Cowl&r to aid you in your combat. Strays spawned within this structure &acan drop &bice&r, or rarely &bpacked ice&r, on death, and they’re the only mob allowed to spawn inside.\"
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests22: The journals from which I discovered these dungeons had this to say: \"This shell of an &cundersea town&r is home to many axe-wielding &edrowned&r and provides a renewable source of &bcoral blocks&r. Weapons from a time forgotten, such as the &bWarped Axe&r, can still be found inside.\"
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests23: The journals from which I discovered these dungeons had this to say: \"Once you defeat the dragon and gain access to the &couter islands&r, you may be lucky enough to find this &cdilapidated structure&r. There isn’t much loot inside, but at the top of the tower, you can find a &bdragon egg&r. Be careful though, the &eendermen&r inside &aaren’t quite as peaceful&r as the ones outside of the structure.\"
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests24: The journals from which I discovered these dungeons had this to say: \"Found in the lava pools of the Nether’s &csoul sand valley&r, you may find this &cprison of souls&r. With the amount of &eghasts&r surrounding it, approaching and reaching the top for your reward may prove to be a no small task. Be wary as the ghasts are not opposed to &adestroying the structure around you&r with their fireballs. Should you survive, you may walk out with a &bSoul Cannon&r.\"
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests25: Find Structures with the Explorer's Compass
The &bExplorer's Compass&r replaces &bEnder Eyes&r as the primary way to locate &aStrongholds and other Structures&r.
Simply &6right click while holding it&r in order to search for the structure you want to find.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests26: Find Biomes with the Nature's Compass
The &bNature's Compass&r is a magical tool, similar to a &bDowsing Rod&r, which will allow you to find your way to a particular type of biome.
Simply &6right click while holding it&r in order to search for the biome you want to find.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests28: &bWarp Plates&r function alongside &bAttuned Shards&r to teleport you between two defined places. Once placed and right clicked, a Warp Plate will create an Attuned Shard which is bound to that Warp Plate. The Shard will be &ainscribed with unique runes&r that match those in the Plate's GUI upper right corner.
In you &6insert the shard into another Warp Plate&r, it will now teleport you to the Plate inscribed on that stone. You can create multiple Shards with &bFlint&r and &bWarp Dust&r.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests29: &bWaystones&r are a method for fast travel between places in the world. Once a Waystone has been &aactivated&r, it can be ported to from any other Waystone, or using other methods.
&bWaystones&r generate naturally in &dVillages&r, but they can also be crafted.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests30: The &bBound Scroll&r is a single-use item which can teleport to you &aa Waystone to which it is bound&r. Simply &6crouch and right click&r the Waystone to bind the scroll. Each scroll must be bound individually. However, you can craft &bReturn Scrolls&r and bind an entire stack at once.
Simply &6hold right click with it in your hand&r in order to activate it. If you take damage or let go while it is charging, &dthe warp will cancel&r.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests31: The &bWarp Scroll&r is a one-time use item which can &awarp to any Waystone from anywhere in the world&r. It does not have a cooldown, but the item is consumed upon use.
Simply &6hold right click with it in your hand&r in order to activate it. If you take damage or let go while it is charging, &dthe warp will cancel&r.
These should not be confused with the &bWarp Scrolls&r from &dArs Nouveau&r, which have the same name but a different function.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests32: The &bWarp Stone&r is an item which will allow you to &awarp to any Waystone from anywhere in the world&r. It is a multi-use item, which has a cooldown between uses.
Simply &6hold right click with it in your hand&r in order to activate it. If you take damage or let go while it is charging, &dthe warp will cancel&r.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests33: The &bPortstone&r is a method of accessing Waystone travel, but cannot be traveled to, itself.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests34: &bSharestones&r allow for travel &aonly within their colored network&r. From a Red Sharestone, you can teleport to any other Red Sharestone. However, you cannot do so from an Orange Sharestone.
This makes them very useful for having private or separate networks of travel. They cannot be access from &bWarp Stones&r or any &bScrolls&r.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests35: Long ago, wandering tribes of &aVillagers&r mastered the art of &amagical flight&r, and now exist in &cfloating cities&r across the land.
If one were to have a &bflying Broomstick&r, one could easily reach such a place!
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests36: Obtain Rope Ladder and a Wooden Rail

Craft yourself some &bRope Ladders&r and &bWooden Rails&r to carefully traverse difficult terrain - easy to make, easy to place, and able to &achain across air gaps&r without support blocks below them. Vertical and Horizontal travel has never been so handy! Both can be placed similarly to &bScaffolding&r- &6right click one onto another&r and they’ll build in the direction you face. You can even &apull your rope ladder up&r behind you by right clicking the top piece!
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests37: &bMagnetite&r generates in small clusters underground, surrounded by lava and deepslate iron, &aencased in a shell of obsidian&r. Harvest this rare ore with your Pickaxe to get magnetite chunks… or for &bMagnetite ore&r, use a Hammer + Chisel (or &asilk touch&r). Both of these items will help you discover some strangely attractive new crafting recipes!
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests38: Cozy up to some bears in this lovely little den in the woods! It's probably totally safe! They're harmless! Probably!
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests39: The &cTinker's Workshop&r appears to be a fairly innocuous place upon first glance. Perhaps an &eEngineer&r once lived here. Or perhaps someone a little less... sane.
Beware of &ePillagers&r, and should you find any ladders down... well, &aproceed with caution&r. And maybe bring your broom.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests40: Should you happen upon a very large wagon, be sure to greet its inhabitants! These &ejolly fellows&r are nomadic people &abringing gifts&r to adventurers far and wide.
ftbquests.chapter.globetrotting.quests41: &aDeep underground&r is the structure known as &cThe Nexus&r. This carved deepslate monstrosity contains broken portals to other worlds, such as the &cNether&r and &cThe Twilight Forest&r.
These gateways are broken and in need of mending. Unfortunately it seems &amost are broken irreparably&r, and those worlds cannot be visited.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.title: 魔法巫师
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests0.descri: 巫师手里最重要的工具之一是&b暗影之书&r，他们在其中记录沿途的知识和经验。
关于你所在的这个世界上的魔法，这本书很有帮助地&a提供了许多信息&r，尽管这并不是一个完整的指南。
要阅读你的&b暗影之书&r，你必须将其放在一个书坛上。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests1.descri: 你需要一个&b书坛&r来放置你的&b暗影之书&r。要制作这个魔法基座，你需要在&a丛林&r生物群系找到一棵&b桃花芯树&r。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests2.title: 合成一根探测棒
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests2.subtit: 指明道路的神奇指南针
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests2.descri: 用来定位这个mod中的多数内容，其一，先定位一片&a沼泽&r或&a丛林&r生物群系。这些都能通过&b自然指南针&r或&b探测棒&r找到。
&b探测棒&r的叶子会&a改变颜色当它朝着&r上述生物群系之一时。如果你把它做成&b自然指南针&r，你就能&a搜索周围地区&r的任何生物群系。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests3.descri: &b月光石&r只能在&a丛林&r或&a沼泽&r生物群系的晶洞中找到。月光石是一种有着强大净化特性的水晶。
月光石能用来做&b下界合金扫帚头&r，也可以酿造&b奶瓶&r，或是&a洗染色玻璃&r。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests4.title: 做一个混合釜
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests4.descri: 炼药锅够用了，但你会想得到更神奇的东西。要制作这个高级合成工具，只需要用&b铁锭&r和&b火把&r增强一口普通的&b炼药锅&r。
&d当心！不要对着混合锅使用无限水桶！&r这会消耗水桶的水和附魔。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests5.title: 制造一个珍宝盒
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests5.descri: &b珍宝盒&r是一种储物箱，功能与&b潜影盒&r类似，因为其被破坏后&a保留其中的物品&r。当玩家靠近时，它还会&a展示内容物&r，既实用又好看！
珍宝盒还支持染色和重命名。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests6.title: 制作注魔布料
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests6.descri: &b注魔布料&r是你打造的第一套&b女巫长袍&r的基础材料。尽管是用布料做的，但这套长袍经纱和纬纱纵横交织，给予了额外的防御力。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests7.title: 制造一个蘸注器
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests7.subtit: Is a \"big dipper\" joke too obvious?
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests7.descri: &b蘸注器&r用于制作蜡烛。它能放置在&b混合釜&r上，向釜中填充&b油脂&r（由动物脂肪熬制而成）并将线挂在上面就能&6制作蜡烛&r。
不同于原版蜡烛，它们可以与不同颜色的蜡烛放在一起并且可以单独点燃！
&b油脂&r能在混合釜中通过&b动物脂肪和蜂窝&r合成。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests8.title: 制作一个烛台
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests8.descri: &b烛台&r是一个装饰方块，能够放在方块上或吊在方块下，用于照亮周遭区域。
它可以和&b锁链&r无缝连接。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests9.title: 制作一个带杵的臼
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests9.descri: &b带杵的臼&r是研磨草药的工具。现在，它的主要作用是制作&b混合种子&r以驯服&a乌鸦&r。非常值得！
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests10.descr: 你可以用&b烘干架&r&6将草药晾干&r。它同样是一个可爱的装饰。
