ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests11.title: 制作一个鼠尾草燃烧盘
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests11.descr: &b鼠尾草燃烧盘&r允许你燃烧&b鼠尾草&r，可以在大范围内&a阻止敌对怪物生成&r。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests12.title: 制作一捆鼠尾草
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests12.descr: 燃烧鼠尾草是一种古老的、有记载的净化暗能或是邪量的方法。 在这个世界中，这能&a在燃烧盘附近相当大的范围内阻止怪物生成&r。
要点燃&b鼠尾草捆&r，首先要把它挂在&b烘干架&r上，直到水分消失并且叶子干燥。接下来，把这捆草放到&b鼠尾草燃烧盘&r上并用&b打火石&r点燃。
在白天，这捆草能够被&a熄灭&r（&6空手shift右击&r）并&a保留耐久度&r，可供下一晚再次使用。
附注：烧鼠尾草是一种多元文化的做法，不应与烧烟草混为一谈。 烧烟草是一种在封闭空间恐吓原住民的做法，不应在Minecraft中尝试。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests13.descr: 每个巫师都需要一顶好的&b帽子&r。你可以用&b注魔布料&r制作你的，或者在沼泽的&d巫师公会&r找到它。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests14.title: 用蘑菇装饰你的帽子
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests14.subti: 说真的，这是最牛的升级
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests14.descr: 用蘑菇装饰帽子的人审美一定很不错，尽管这没有任何的实际好处。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests15.title: 女巫长袍
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests15.descr: &b长袍&r是&b巫师三件套&r的第二件。这套装备比&b钻石套&r稍微弱一点，但比&b铁套&r更强因为它有自带魔法保护效果。
不幸的是，巫师似乎不关心裤子—— 如果你想要，你就必须去其他地方转转。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests16.subti: These boots were made for witchin'
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests16.descr: &b巫师套&a套装奖励&r取决于你穿着多少单件（总共3件）
在套装中的任意一件上按住shift来查看套装奖励。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests17.title: 制作一个草药罐
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests17.descr: &b草药罐&r能够通过在&b混合釜&r中融化8块&b沙子&r制作而成。每个草药罐&a仅能装一种&r草药，但能&a装1024份&r这种草药！
草药罐能&a展示里面存的物品&r，并且能够通过&b铁砧&r命名。被破坏后，草药罐能够保存其中的物品。
&6左击&r一个草药罐拿取一个物品。&6潜行左键&r拿取一组。
如果草药罐内的按钮（&6蹲下右击&r来打开界面）被按下，&e驯服的乌鸦&r会&a采集和存放收获的草药&r。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests18.descr: 乌鸦喜欢音乐！如果你找不到你的乌鸦，你可以通过使用&b乌鸦竖笛&r来立刻召唤它们。你需要&b桃花心木&r和一些&b染料&r来合成这个。
&6拿着竖笛右击&r演奏一段曲子来召唤你的&e乌鸦&r。
如果你&6用竖笛潜行右击一只乌鸦&r，你就能通过&a选择&r按钮选择它。接着，你可以选择&a栖息&r，然后&6击一个方块&r告诉你的乌鸦在这里栖息。当你指定&a收集&r时乌鸦会把物品带回栖息点。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests19.title: 在臼中混合一些种子
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests19.descr: 合成一些&b混合种子&r来驯服&e野生乌鸦&r。一旦你驯服了一只乌鸦，它将帮助你完成营地附近的任务！
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests20.title: 制作一把扫帚和口哨
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests20.descr: &b扫帚&r有三种，&a柳树&r、&a金缕梅&r、以及&a桃花心木&r。金缕梅和柳树扫帚制作容易，但是骑着稍慢并且易燃。桃花心木扫帚更快并且抗火——很值得升级！
你可以&6潜行右击&r你的扫帚来查看它的自定义选项，同样能把它从&a悬浮&r模式转换到&a放置模式&r，这决定了你下扫帚的时候扫帚会怎样。
你同样会需要一个&b扫帚口哨&r。
弄丢了你的扫帚？别担心！把它召唤到你身边只需要&6右击&r你的&b扫帚口哨&r！
首先你需要把&b口哨&6和&b扫帚&6放在和合成栏中&r来将其绑定。你可以&a取消绑定&r通过&6单独合成&b口哨&r。
注意&d你的扫帚在视野内这个方法是最奏效的&r。它会尝试飞向你，但它仅仅只是一把扫帚因此它&a不是很聪明&r会经常撞到东西。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests21.title: 制作防水扫帚头
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests21.subti: 你也可以成为一个海王
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests21.descr: 通常情况下，当你飞行时进入水中，你会从扫帚上摔下来。但是，通过在一端加上这个扫帚头，就能在有限时间内防止你在水中下车。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests22.title: 制作一个小挎包
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests22.descr: 你可以在你的&b扫帚&r上添加一个&b挎包&r，两者都是非常可爱的装饰，可以作为一种旅途中一种储存物品的方式！
挎包一共有三种：&b小型挎包&r&b中型挎包&r&b大型挎包&r。扫帚只能装备一种挎包。
中型挎包需要一个小型挎包来合成。大型挎包需要一个中型挎包和一个小型挎包，把他们结合起装在你的扫帚上。
潜行右击你的扫帚可以打开它的&a配饰和物品栏&r。
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests23.title: Obtain an Enhanced Broom Brush
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests23.descr: &b增强扫帚尾&r有更高的耐久。做出来别忘了把它晾干！
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests24.descr: &b曼德拉草根&r通常用于升级你的&b扫帚&r同样也能用于&b堆肥&r。
You can also use it to &abrew Mystical Concoctions&r with the &bCrucible&r! See the &dMystic Alchemy&r section for more info.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests25.title: Obtain a Blood Sigil
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests25.descr: Blood Sigils are used to collect blood for rituals. They are crafted with &bRedstone&r and &bPolished Blackstone&r.
Once you have crafted the Sigil, place it in the bottom of your &bMixing Cauldron&r (by &aright-clicking and placing it in the left slot of the crafting interface&r).

Once it is installed, make sure there is no liquid in your Cauldron, and then &ajump inside of it&r. Blood must be taken from a willing participant, and that means you! Jump 3 times to obtain enough Blood for 1 Bottle. Then, right click the Cauldron with a &bGlass Bottle&r to collect it.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests26.title: Obtain Broom Netherite Tip
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests26.descr: Much like the Waterproof Tip, the &bNetherite Broom Tip&r will prevent players getting dismounted due to lava. It is recommended to use this with a &bMahogany Broom&r, as it is fire resistant.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests27.title: Obtain a Replacement Broom Brush
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests27.descr: As you use your Broom, the Brush will eventually lose durability and need replacing. Begin by making the standard &bWet Broom Brush&r, which can be either immediately upgraded to an &bEnhanced Broom Brush&r, or dried out for use on a &bDrying Rack&r.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests28.descr: &b颠茄花&r用于升级你的&b扫帚&r，也可用于&b堆肥&r。
不过，要小心！&a这种浆果是有毒的&r。
You can also use it to &abrew Mystical Concoctions&r with the &bCrucible&r! See the &dMystic Alchemy&r section for more info.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests29.descr: &bYellow Dock&r is used to upgrade your &bBroom&r, and can also be used to create &bCompost&r.
You can also use it to &abrew Mystical Concoctions&r with the &bCrucible&r! See the &dMystic Alchemy&r section for more info.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests30.descr: &bMugwort&r is used to upgrade your &bBroom&r, and can also be used to create &bCompost&r.
You can also use it to &abrew Mystical Concoctions&r with the &bCrucible&r! See the &dMystic Alchemy&r section for more info.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests31.title: Meet a Crow
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests31.descr: Once you meet your first &eCrow&r, you're ready to tame. Bring lots of &bSeed Mixture&r because they can be hard to win over!
Once you have tamed the Crow Familiar, you can &6crouch and right click it&r to &aaccess its menu&r.

If you &6right click without crouching&r, you will &achange its mode&r to Sit, Follow, and more. You can do that in the menu, as well. By default, it will Follow and sit on your shoulder, unless you crouch.
&aCrows can be equipped with hats and weapons&r via the menu. It can wear most helmets and wield most melee weapons.
Through the menu, you can instruct your &eFamiliar&r to help you farm your crops, or to follow you in combat, or even to &apickpocket villagers&r.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests32.title: Breeding Crows
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests32.descr: You can breed two tamed &eCrows&r by gifting one of them a shiny &bGolden Nugget&r. It will then bring it to its potential mate, and the two will pair up!
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests33.title: Discover the Dark Coven
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests33.descr: Hidden away in &cSwamps&r is the &cDark Coven&r, a city of &eWitches&r who are up to no good. If you are &6wearing their robes&r, they will ignore you. But anyone not perceived to be one of them is considered an enemy.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests34.descr: The &bReplacer Satchel&r is incredibly useful, as it will &areplace broken &bBroom Brushes&r with ones in its inventory, beginning with the &6top left&r.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests35.descr: The &bEnder Satchel&r is a storage upgrade which &agrants easy access to your Ender Chest inventory!&r.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests36.descr: Equip your &eCrow&r with this &bAnkh&r to protect it from danger. It will grant it &aRegen&r while it's playing dead, and &aacts as a &bTotem of Undying&r in case the &eCrow&r dies.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.title: Miscellaneous
A way to communicate in multiplayer

You can send letters and packages to your friends! You can &asend and receive mail&r using a &bSnailbox&r. Placing it down claims it, and you can even give it a name by &6right clicking on it&r and entering text in the name field.

To &asend mail&r, you'll need a &bStamp&r and an &bOpen Envelope&r. These envelopes can be reused, so they're good for the environment. &6Place the Envelope in the upper right of the &bSnailbox&r. Then click &6\"Open Envelope&r.\"

In here, you can put your mail! You can send &bpostcards, wrapped parcels, and more&r! &aDon't forget to add a Stamp&r! Enter the name of the recipient, your name if desired, and then &6Hit Esc to go back to the previous window&r!
Once you've hit &dEsc&r, you can &aselect the Snailbox to send to&r, and ta-da! You're done!
The &bSandcastle&r can be placed over &bTurtle Eggs&r in order to protect them from Zombies.
However, there is &da bug currently&r which prevents eggs in a &bSand Castle&r from hatching.
Unfortunately not the experience you can put on your resume
A piece of &bCarved Nephrite&r allows you to store your Experience in a network, to prevent it being lost or reduced on death. Connect multiple &bCarved Nephrite&r together to store even more.
It also allows you to &ashare experience with others&r!
Additionally, you can store up to 30 levels in a &bNephrite Ring&r.
Stand on the &bSiphon&r to drain your EXP, and activate the &bFountain&r to shower yourself in it.
The &bIron Grate&r works to keep animals inside, as they are afraid to walk over it, although you can lead them across by attaching a &bLead&r to them. &aItems will fall through it&r.
Found as loot in chests, the &bAncient Tomes&r are books of long-lost knowledge which will allow you to &aadd a level to the specified enchantment&r by combining the Tome with the &bEnchanted Book&r at an &bAnvil&r.
Lots of things can go in bottles.
You can obtain a &bCloud in a Bottle&r by ascending to &acloud height&r and &6right clicking the air with a glass bottle&r.

You can release the Cloud by right-clicking the bottle in the air. It will shortly disappear. However, if the cloud is &6replaced with another block&r, it returns to the bottle. This allows you to &aplace blocks in midair&r.
Cindershelly, cindershelly, oh we love our cindershelly
The &bCinder Furnace&r is a unique item which &aonly functions on the back of a &eCindershell Tortoise&r, which live in the Nether Wastes.
You can befriend and breed them with &bFungus&r - but beware, they have a LOT of young at once.
If you place this &bFurnace&r on top of a &eCindershell&r, it will use the beast's volcanic heat to &asmelt items without fuel&r!
Did you know that you can &aspeed up the tick speed of a block&r? This can be used on things like &bCompost&r to make them progress faster.
Craft the &bTime in a Bottle&r and hold it in your inventory to accumulate time. Then, you can &6shift right click&r on certain blocks to apply that time to them.
Despite all my rage, I am still just a...oh you know

The &bCage&r is similar to the &bCapture Cell&r, in that you can &6right click it on a small mob&r to pick it up and transport it. You can &6right click a block to release&r the mob, or you can &6shift right click&r to place the &bCage&r down and display your new friend in their enclosure!
Did you know you can grind the enchantment off of the &bEnchanted Golden Apple&r?
That would be utterly ridiculous to do, and yet...
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests10: The &bWrench&r is an item which can &arotate blocks&r. Just &6right click the block&r with the &bWrench&r, and it will adjust the position based on where you click it.
Does not work on objects which have the same texture on all sides (such as planks).
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests11: The &bSleeping Bag&r is an item which will allow you to &apass the night without setting spawn&r. Simply carry it with you and &6right click it on the ground&r to use it.
You can &6shift right click&r in order to place it without sleeping.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests12: Make a &bHammock&r to &asleep through the day&r, making it night easily. Then, get up to shenanigans!
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests13: Have you ever fallen in love with the color palette of one biome, but your base is somewhere else entirely? Well, worry not! With &bBiome Jars&r, you can &6pick up the biome and transport it!&r
Right click the &bBiome Jar&r on the ground of the biome you want to take. Wait just long enough to go - \"Is this worki -\"
&l&dBANG!&r Yes, it's working! Once it completes its capture, you can &6right click it&r to pick it back up.
Then, take your jar and &6right click it&r on the area you want to transfer the new biome to.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests14: Villagers who have &abeen zombified and then cured&r will offer &asignificant discounts&r.
Should you find a &eZombie Villager&r, &6hit them with a Splash Potion of Weakness&r, and then &6give them a golden apple&r. After a time, they will be cured!
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests15: &bEmeralds&r! These are the bread and butter of the &eVillagers&r which live in your world. You will need these to obtain rare items such as the new &bEnd Portal Eyes&r.
To find a &alist of all villager professions and their job blocks&r, hover over an &bEmerald&r and &6press \"u\"&r, then &6choose the top tab with a villager face&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests16: The first time you trade with a villager, their &aprofession and possible trades will become locked&r. This is a good way to ensure that the &aLibrarian&r who sells &bMending&r doesn't suddenly run away to join the circus.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests17: Goblin Traders are friendly fellows who are always happy to do business with humans! They're not the smartest, though, so they tend to offer deals that are quite good.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests18: Flip a coin. Or a lever.
As its name suggests, the &bRedstone Randomizer&r determines randomly whether to output the provided signal to the &aleft or to the right&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests19: You know the joke I wanna make.
The &bCog Block&r performs the same way that &bplaced Redstone&r does. However, it doesn't wash away in water, and can be placed vertically both up and down to send a signal.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests20: Depending on weather, this decorative block will output a redstone signal.
When it is &araining&r, it will output a signal of 1. When it is &athundering&r, it will output a signal of 2.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests21: &bBellows&r are blocks that can &aspeed up furnaces&r, &aprevent fires from extinguishing&r, and even &apush entities&r.
The rate at which the Bellows pump is determined by the strength of the &aRedstone signal&r it is receiving.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests22: Perhaps this is too obvious to explain, but the &bTurntable&r is a block that, when provided with a Redstone signal, will rotate the block it is touching.
When placed sideways, it can turn an &bHourglass&r to reset it.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests23: Beware the power of the Illuminate-y

The &bRedstone Illuminator&r is a light source which is on by default. It grows dimmer depending on how much &aRedstone signal&r it receives. One can use a &bCrank&r instead of a &bLever&r for more fine-tuned control.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests24: Just hope it's not too leaky
The &bFaucet&r is an item which will &awithdraw, and drop, items from the sides of blocks&r (inventories, beehives, or jars). This is opposed to Hoppers, which can only withdraw from the bottom.
They also function like &bDripstone&r, slowly dripping liquids into a cauldron beneath them.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests25: The &bEnder Watcher&r transmits a Redstone signal when &aa player is looking at it&r. The signal intensity is determined by how far the player is.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests26: The &bIron Rod&r is not just a decoration, it is also functional. When it is placed on a &bSticky Piston&r, it will &abreak the block&r the Piston pushes it into.
This only works on blocks which can be pushed, so blocks like &bObsidian&r will not be affected.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests27: The &bObsidian Pressure Plate&r can &aonly be activated by players&r, making it very useful for base entrances and such.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests28: This sand doesn't care about your RULES
This unique End-enchanted item will only &afall when provided with a Redstone signal&r. If it is provided a redstone signal and &acannot fall, it will float up instead&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests29: These special buttons function similarly to other &bButtons&r, except that the &bIron Button&r gives a &amuch longer signal&r than usual, and the &bGold Button&r a &amuch shorter signal&r than usual.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests30: The &bChute&r is a block which draws items from above it and &adrops them&r perfectly in the center of the block below it.
It can be disabled with a Redstone signal, or by placing a block directly below it.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests32: You no longer need to break a villager's job block to cycle through their trades. Simply &aask nicely&r (byt &6pressing the Cycle Trades button&r).
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests33: &bPostcards&r and &bParcels&r are from the mod &lContact&r. Unfortunately, this mod's &bMailboxes&r have a &dbad habit of coming unclaimed&r, so that &dno one can receive mail&r. However, they can still be sent via &lSnail Mail&r, an idea come up with by a very smart witch.
Postcards can be &aobtained from the Wandering Trader&r or earned through quest rewards. You can &6right click&r while holding them to write on them.
You can wrap gifts up in &bWrapping Paper&r. Each parcel can hold 4 items. There is no functional difference between the regular and Ender versions when using them with &lSnail Mail&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests34: Playing a fun game is its own reward, but here's an extra bonus for spending so much time with us!
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests35: Although not all mermaids are witches, there are some &anotable examples of some which are&r. You, too, can keep a creepy garden under the sea with the help of the &bSea Necklace&r, which will equip you with a &atail all your own!&r It will also &agrant you swim speed bonuses&r and the &aability to breathe&r underwater indefinitely.
To craft it, you'll need a &bSea Crystal&r, which you can craft with a little luck at treasure-hunting!
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests36: Apple Crates for Commerce and Deco!
If you're playing with others, you can use Crates from the &lApple Crates&r mod to &asell items to one another&r!
A) This input is &athe item you want to receive&r as payment. Place one into the slot.
B) This is the &aitem you're trading&r. Stack size matters - in this example the trade is &a1 emerald for 64 cheeseburgers&r.
D) You must &6press this button to lock in your trade&r.
E) This is the &ainventory of the crate&r. Place all your items for sale here.
F) This is where your &apayment is stored&r. As people purchase from you, the items they use to pay will go here.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests37: you now owe money to a raccoon
Have you ever seen a &aflying chest attached to a balloon&r? You can &6shoot them down&r! Keep your bow at your side.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests38: If you're incredibly lucky, maybe you can land a &bRare Balloon Box&r!
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests39: Now that you've gotten your first &bSea Crystal&r, you can craft it into a &bSea Necklace&r. This can be worn in your &achest slot&r or &aas a curio&r.
Equipping the necklace will &aturn you into a mermaid while in water&r. This will allow you to &aswim quickly&r and &abreathe underwater&r.
You can also &6upgrade your appearance&r by crafting the &bNecklace&r with &bupgrade items&r.
You can dye your tail by &6crafting the &bNecklace&r with different &bdyes&r, just like &bleather armor&r.
To &dremove dyes or upgrades&r, you need to &6hold the necklace&r in your hand and &6right click&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests40: This &bGlowing Pearl&r will make your mermaid top and tail shimmer as if &aenchanted&r!
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests41: Use this item to look like you're in h2o: Just Add Water!
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests42: Once you've dyed your tail, you can &aadd a gradient&r by &6crafting this item with &bdye&r and then &6crafting it with your necklace&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests43: Want to be the Little Mermaid? This upgrade will &agive you Ariel's appearance&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests44: Craft your necklace with this accessory to &aadd a bra to your mermaid look&r!
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests45: &bDimensional Tears&r, pronounced like \"scares,\" are a fluid which &ateleports an entity&r to its point of origin. If a &eplayer&r has a &arespawn point&r set, it will bring them there. If they don't, and for &eall other entities&r, it will transport them to &cworld spawn&r.
You can obtain this item from &acertain chests&r, or by &6right clicking a bottle&r onto &bCrying Obsidian&r or an activated &bRespawn Anchor&r.
To use the item, either &6drink it from the bottle&r or &6place it in a cauldron&r and jump into it.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests46: &bGlow Sticks&r are a light source that can be &aplaced on any surface&r or &athrown like a snowball&r (placing itself wherever it lands).
They can be &athrown and placed underwater&r, making them ideal for subnautical exploration.
Glow sticks also come in all 16 colors as well as the glow ink hue, making them ideal for &amarking out pathways&r to different locations.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests47: &bMagnetite&r generates in small clusters deep underground, and are surrounded by &bLava&r and &bDeepslate Iron&r, encased in a shell of &bObsidian&r. These geodes are somewhat rare to come across.
You'll need &aSilk Touch&r or a &bHammer and Chisel&r to obtain the blocks, otherwise you will get &bMagnetite Chunks&r instead, which can be used in crafting.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests48: Crafted with &bCinnabar&r and &bMagnetite&r, this incredibly useful tool will &adraw items on the ground to you&r for pickup!
Simply &6right click while holding it&r to activate it, and then &akeep it in your inventory&r. You can turn it off the same way.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests49: &bRough Cinnabar&r is dropped from &bRedstone Ore&r. To gain the refined version, &6polish it on a Grindstone&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests50: The &bDiamond Grindstone&r gives a finer polish and thus is suitable for &ararer gems&r such as &bDiamonds&r or &bEmeralds&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests52: Among its other duties, a &bGrindstone&r can be used to &apolish Rough minerals&r, as long as they're not too precious.
By &6right clicking the item&r on the &bGrindstone&r, you can polish &bRough Lazurite or Cinnabar&r.
Note that you can also use &bSandpaper&r to polish these gems.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests54: Okay, I admit, I have a Cauldron addiction. Can you blame me?
Anyway, the &bReinforced Cauldron&r has a few traits to set it apart from its brethren.
It &afunctions as an infinite water source&r when filling &bEmpty Bottles&r.
It can also be filled with potions, but don't try to mix different kinds!
There is supposedly a way to dip one's weapon in it, but this seems to be dysfunctional at this time.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests55: The &bRudimentary Gauntlet&r is a weapon which, by itself, is not all that impressive. However, &aupgrading it&r will unlock its true potential!
As it is, it is &acomparable to an &bIron Sword&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests56: The &bNetherite Gauntlet&r is slightly more powerful than its sword counterpart, but what is truly impressive is &aits final upgrade&r: the &bPotioneer Gauntlet&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests57: The &bPotioneer's Gauntlet&r allows one to &ainject potions into their attacks&r using the &bPotion Injector&r. Up to 6 &bLingering Potions&r can be injected.
When attacking with the Gauntlet, you will deal both melee damage and the potion effect's damage. This can be toggled by pressing &6shift+right click&r.
Once one potion is used, it will automatically load up the next potion after a few seconds.
They will &aload in the order they were placed&r in the Injector UI. The potions are not consumed, but will be on cooldown after use.
To resupply your gauntlet, apply &bBlaze Powder&r in the &bPotion Injector&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests58: Those who experiment with altering their states may find themselves in quite the situation, not entirely knowing how they arrived at this conclusion.
This achievement involves getting &aevery vanilla effect&r at once, as well as the following modded effects:
Sculk Affinity (Deeper and Darker), Panic, Serenity (both Environmental), Health Boost, Resilience (Quark).
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests59: Even the most honest witch needs to sneak around sometimes. But you...well, you've snuck around &3a lot&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests60: Wow, you've caught 999 fish? That's bonkers.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests61: What soothes the soul more than houseplants?
Plant &a50 lovely green (or pink or blue) friends&r in basic &bFlower Pots&r.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests62: The &bMagnum Torches&r are a set-it-and-forget-it method of preventing mob spawns.
The &bDiamond Magnum Torch&r prevents &ehostile mobs&r from spawning.
The &bEmerald Magnum Torch&r prevents &eneutral and passive mobs&r from spawning.
The &bAmethyst Magnum Torch&r prevents &lALL&r mob spawns.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests63: Why not travel a while by Pig? It may not be fast, or efficient, or even particularly fun.
No, that's it, that's the whole sentence.
ftbquests.chapter.miscellaneous.quests64: Winning a &aRaid&r can be a satisfying challenge. Even better, win a bunch of raids, and you'll get rewarded!
ftbquests.chapter.scavenger_hunt.title: Scavenger Hunt
ftbquests.chapter.scavenger_hunt.quests3: Looking for something to spend some time on? Why not &aa Scavenger Hunt?&r. Obtain these items for the ability to claim an incredible prize!
&6Click the checkbox in this quest to begin.&r. This can be done at any time.
&dCongratulations&r on collecting every item in the hunt! Please enjoy your fabulous prizes (and the sense of personal satisfaction, which is the real treasure).
The check mark above unlocks &6once all Scavenger Hunt Quests are done&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.title: Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests0.title: Craft a Functional Storage Drawer
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests0.subtit: I'm an artist, not a drawer
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests0.descri: &bStorage Drawers&r are inventory items which can hold massive amounts of a single item in one block.
You can make multiple variations, holding from 1-4 items, and in many different wood types.
&bFramed Drawers&r can be made to show any block texture. &6Hold shift&r while hovering over a &bFramed Drawer&r to read instructions.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests1.title: Obtain your first Storage Upgrade
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests1.descri: This &bStorage Upgrade&r will &aincrease the amount of items&r your Drawers can hold.
There are multiple tiers of upgrades, which can be used together or mix-and-matched.
Each drawer can accept 7 different upgrades.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests2.descri: 如果你有太多的物品要导入你的抽屉，那&b虚空升级&r十分有用——它能自动清除抽屉已满时装不下的物品，避免游戏卡顿。
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests3.descri: The &bCompacting Drawer&r is unique from other drawers because it allows you to access &amultiple compressions of an item&r.

The usual example would be something like &bIron&r, because it will give you access to &bIron Blocks&r, &bIron Ingots&r, and &bIron Nuggets&r. If you insert 9 Iron Ingots, you can withdraw either 1 Block, 9 Ingots, or 81 Nuggets, without having to craft.
However, this also works for items such as &bCrops&r, which can be withdrawn as Crates. This works with any item which has a &a3x3 compression recipe&r.
The &bSimple Compacting Drawer&r does the same thing, except for items which only have 2 variations, such as crops or eggs.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests4.descri: The &bDrawer Controller&r is very important for hooking your &bDrawers&r up to your &aStorage Network&r.
You can also use it to &aimport items&r to your drawers via a Hopper or &bPipez&r!
You will need to use a &bLinking Tool&r to connect each &bDrawer&r with the &bController&r by &6right clicking&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests5.descri: &aConfiguration Tools&r alter the function of Drawers. &6Right click on a Drawer while holding a Key&r to activate its ability.
The basic mode, &bLocking&r, locks a Drawer so that it can only accept the item/s currently inside of it.
The &bHide/Show Amounts&r mode toggles whether or not the amount of items contained within the Drawer is visible on its surface.
The &bHide/Show Item Renders&r mode will completely hide the item image and all other labels from the front of the Drawer.
The &bHide/Show Upgrades&r will show or hide what upgrades a Drawer currently contains.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests6.title: Obtain a Golden Apple Crate
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests6.subtit: Some have crateness thrust upon them
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests6.descri: Oh I know, it's such a bother... your storage is just &olousy&r with &bGolden Apples&r - well worry no more, you can &acompress them&r into crates. These &bGolden Apple Crates&r can even be used to power a &bBeacon&r!
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests7.descri: There are a number of &ajar types&r in this modpack. This one holds liquids! Up to three buckets worth.
It can hold everything from &bWater&r to &bSoups&r to even &bExperience&r.
They can also function as &afish tanks&r or &acookie jars&r.
Right click the jar with an empty hand to eat or drink its contents. Don't worry, you won't eat the lava.
You can &aplace the jar by crouching and right clicking&r it. If you &asimply right click&r, you will instead capture small mobs such as &eSmall Slimes&r or &eBees&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests8.title: Obtain a Basket
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests8.subtit: I wonder if you could play ball with it.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests8.descri: The &bBasket&r can be used as a chest, but also as a hopper! It has the &astorage capacity of a chest&r, and when dropped or thrown items land on top of it, they will &aautomatically go into its inventory&r.
For example, you could &6place one upside-down&r above a &bStove&r in order to collect the finished products! Or put one at the end of a &bConveyer Belt&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests9.title: Network Interface
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests9.descri: &lTom's Simple Storage&r is a mod which allows you to &aaccess all your inventory from a single interface&r. Who Tom was has been lost to legend, but his storage systems remain. &lSophisticated Storage&r is a storage solution with a focus on &aproviding lots of space in a small footprint&r. The two systems can work together!
To begin with, you'll need a &bStorage Terminal&r from &lTom's&r.

Then, you need to make a choice between the &bInventory Connector&r from &lTom's&r, or a &bStorage Controller&r from &lSophisticated&r. Inventory Connectors work with both vanilla and Sophisticated containers, whereas &bStorage Controllers&r connect only to Sophisticated's containers. However, the remote capabilities of the &bStorage Controller&r are superior to those of the &bInventory Connector&r.
This quest has multiple pages, &6please go to the next page&r.
The &bInventory Connector&r and &bStorage Controller&r are blocks which act as a hub, connecting all touching storages to itself. &dAll touching storages are added to the network automatically&r.

With the &bStorage Controller&r you can link distant storages using a &bStorage Link&r. You can do this with the &bInventory Connector&r as well, by utilizing the &bInventory Trim, or Inventory Cables and Cable Connectors&r.

The &bStorage Terminal&r is the block which lets you see, deposit, and withdraw from your network. It can later be upgraded to a &bCrafting Terminal&r, which also allows you to craft from your inventory network.

Here is an example of a &ahybrid Tom's and Sophisticated setup&r. As you can see, it &duses only inventory containers from&r &lSophisticated Storage&r, with the &bTom's Storage Terminal&r attached to the &bSophisticated's Storage Controller&r.
The remote storages are connected via a &bStorage Link&r.
This is an example of a &aTom's only&r setup, with vanilla containers (though it also supports containers from Sophisticated).
The remote containers are hooked into the &bInventory Connector&r via &bCables&r and &bCable Connectors&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests10.subti: It's not just serious - it's terminal
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests10.descr: The &bCrafting Grid&r, although more expensive, is a worthy upgrade because it allows you to &acraft from JEI or the Recipe Book&r using anything in your storage network.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests11.descr: &bInventory Trim&r is an item which helps to fill in the gaps between connected inventories. As long as the Trim is touching both a valid inventory block, and a block in your system, it will connect all it touches to your network.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests12.title: Connected at a Distance
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests12.descr: While &bInventory Trim&r is what the majority of people will use to connect their network, you can also do it with &bInventory Connectors&r and &bInventory Cables&r.
&6Place the Connectors on the blocks you wish&r, and then &6place the cabling between them&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests13.title: Framed Blocks
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests13.subti: Don't be suspicious, don't be suspicious
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests13.descr: &bFramed blocks&r are ones which can &atake on the appearance of another block&r.
Place your &bFramed Blocks&r in the world, then &6hold the Paint Kit and shift right click&r the block you want them to look like. Then &6right click the framed block&r with the paint kit, and voila!
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests14.descr: The &bWireless Terminal&r is an incredibly useful item, as it allows you to access your inventory network remotely, at a &arange of 16 blocks&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests15.descr: The &bAdvanced Wireless Terminal&r not only extends the range of its previous version (64 blocks instead of 16), but can be made to have &ainfinite range&r if one &6places a level 1 beacon nearby&r.
If you should &6place a level 4 beacon nearby&r, then the signal can transmit &aacross dimensions&r as well!
Can be &6worn as a Belt&r and &aaccessed via a hotkey&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests16.descr: The &bInventory Proxy&r is a niche item which extends access to inventory blocks it's placed adjacent to. It specifically extends &athe face it's touching&r,
This is useful in case your inventories are hard to access due to being inside an automation system, etc.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests17.descr: The &bInventory Hopper&r imports and exports items from your network.
&6Right click it with an item&r to set the filter. This is optional when importing, but required if exporting.
&6Shift right click with an empty hand&r to clear the filter.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests18.descr: The &bLevel Emitter&r transmits a redstone signal based on the contents of an inventory.
The signal is based on whether the inventory contains &amore or less than the set amount&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests19.descr: An &bEnder Chest&r is like cloud storage for your items. This inventory is accessible through any &bEnder Chest&r, anywhere in the world.
It's not a bad idea to fill it with emergency items. You can &again more storage space&r by &6filling it with Shulker Boxes&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests20.descr: As you could guess, the &bRing of Enderchest&r allows you to access your Ender Inventory without needing an &bEnder Chest&r.
It &acannot be worn as a Curio&r but instead must be &6held and right clicked&r in order to be used.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests21.descr: The &bItem Pipe&r is a way for you to easily transfer items from one inventory to another.
It can &aconnect to an individual chest, barrel, or a whole network&r via a &bInventory Connector&r.
You can use a &bWrench&r (either from &lPipez&r or &lCreate&r - the one from &lSupplementaries&r doesn't work) to &achange its mode&r.
&6Shift right click the wrench&r onto one side of the &bPipe&r to connect/disconnect it, and also to &aset to Extract mode&r.
Once in &aExtract Mode&r, you can &6right click on the pipe&r to access its menu.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests22.descr: The &bBasic Pipe Upgrade&r allows you to set a &aRedstone Mode&r for the Pipe. You can set it to &aonly be active&r when receiving a signal, or to &astop when it receives a signal&r. By default, it will &aignore Redstone input&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests23.descr: The &bImproved Upgrade&r gives you &aRedstone Mode&r control, and also allows you to change the &aDistribution mode&r, such as whether to deliver to the &afirst inventory&r, &aRound Robin&r, or &acompletely random&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests24.descr: The &bAdvanced Upgrade&r gives you access to the previous two modes, as well as &aFiltering&r. You can &awhitelist or blacklist&r selected items from being extracted by the pipes.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests25.descr: The &bUltimate Upgrade&r gives you all the previous benefits, while also transporting &aone stack at a time&r, making it the fastest option.
It is also significantly more expensive.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests26.descr: The &bEnder Drawer&r can be &aattuned to a frequency&a using the &bLinking Tool&r. Any other &bEnder Drawer&r attuned to the same frequency will contain the &asame inventory&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests27.title: Lateral Upgrades
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests27.descr: The &bCollector Upgrade&r will &apick up items&r dropped nearby.
The &bPulling Upgrade&r will &apull items from a nearby inventory&r.
The &bPushing Upgrade&r will... you guessed it! &aPush items&r to a nearby inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests28.title: Not Exactly a Pet
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests28.descr: There are many ways to carry items with you while you adventure, but not all of them are quite as terrifying as a &bLuggage&r. It has little concern for others, and loves to &agobble up dropped items&r. And yet, it's strangely endearing.
You can &6access its inventory with right click&r, and &6pick it up with shift right click&r. It &aretains its inventory&r when picked up, and it cannot die.

The &eLuggage&r can &awear a collar&r, which will grant it the enchanted abilities. However, &dplacing the Luggage in your inventory will delete the collar&r, so be sure to remove it before picking it back up.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests29.title: Upgrade your Luggage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests29.descr: The &eLuggage&r, when &astruck by lightning&r, will have its inventory increased.

The easiest way for this to happen is to use a &aRitual of Zapping&r, for which you'll need a &bRitual Tablet&r and a &bBrazier&r. &6Place the tablet and right click&r to begin the ritual. If you want to zap &amultiple creatures&r, you must &aprovide Source&r to the ritual.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests30.descr: Did you know that you can &aTransmit items wirelessly using &bSculk&r? The communications sent along the &amycelial sculk network&r can carry data so complex that it &amanipulates reality&r. Thus, it can take an item from one place and transfer it to another.
To begin with, you'll want a &bGuidebook&r, and to &6harvest some &bSculk&r.
&6Read the chapter \"Gathering Materials\"&r to begin with, to find out what you will need.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests31.title: The Sculk Network Basics
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests31.descr: The first tools you'll need are an &bEmitter&r - to send out items - and a &bReceiver&r - to, well, receive them.

The &bEmitter&r must be &6placed on top of the &bSculk Barrel&r in order to function. The &bSculk Receiver&r, however, can input into &amost basic inventory blocks&r such as Chests, Barrels, and Drawers. It &acannot deposit directly&r into a &bDrawer Controller&r, but you can use &bPipez&r or &bPulling Upgrades&r to withdraw the items into your Drawers.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests32.title: Extending the Range
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests32.descr: By default, &bEmitters&r and &bReceivers&r have to be &awithin 8 blocks of one another&r to function. However, you can &aextend that distance&r by &6placing down Sculk Transmitters&r.
The &bTransmitters&r can also be configured to &aaccept or deny&r certain items placed on their sides. You can &6read more about this&r in the Guidebook.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests33.title: Quantity Modifiers
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests33.descr: The different levels of &bQuantity Modifiers&r will allow &bSculk Emitters&r to transfer and store up to &a64 items&r at a time!
&bReceivers&r and &bTransmitters&r cannot receive these upgrades, but will work with the items sent to them by the &bEmitter&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests34.title: Speed Modifiers
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests34.descr: As you could probably guess, &bSpeed Modifiers&r allow &bEmitters&r and &bReceivers&r to perform their tasks at higher speeds. Do note that &bTransmitters&r work as fast as they can, and can bottleneck transmission.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests36.descr: The &bFilter Destination Tool&r is a multi-use tool which will allow you to &aset the destination&r of a &bfiltered item type&r.
You can assign it an inventory by &6right clicking it &lon the face of the block the &bPipe&6 connects to&r. It will not work if you do not select the correct face of the inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests37.title: Not Quite A Chest
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests37.descr: &eEnder Luggages&r are a tight knit group- unlike regular &eLuggages&r, every&e Ender Luggage&r you own will share the same storage space!
it's just like an &bEnder Chest&r- with feet!
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests38.title: Upgrading Your Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests38.descr: Basic chests and barrels are fine for a while, but the canny witch knows that &athe rules of inventory space&r are meant to be broken. With a little magic, you can easily make your storage bigger - &aand smarter&r!
Let's begin with a simple &bBarrel&r. Place it in the world as usual, and then &6right click it with the &bBasic Tier Upgrade&r.
Now, once you enter the inventory, you'll see some new additions.
The slot to the left &aaccepts upgrades&r which allow your storage to perform certain functions.
The &acog wheel&r on the right gives you access to your &astorage settings&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests39.descr: Within your storage settings, you have the ability to change the way your storage behaves.
Select the &aBarrel icon&r to choose whether your settings apply to &aPlayer&r - ie, &oall&r your storages  - or &aStorage&r - ie, this container only.
Select the &aA/Z icon&r you can select (with &6left click&r) or deselect (with &6right click&r) slots to be auto-sorted.
Select the &aBrain icon&r to &6choose slots to be locked to the item currently in them&r.
Select the &aSword icon&r to choose a slot whose &aitem will be displayed&r on the front of your storage.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests40.title: More Storage, More Upgrade
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests40.descr: There are two ways you can upgrade your storage, &alevel by level&r, or &abasic on upwards&r.
Assuming you used the reward from the last quest, you'll now have an &bIron Barrel&r. You can upgrade this to &aGold tier&r with an &bIron to Gold Upgrade&r. This is taking it up &alevel by level&r.
To upgrade from &aBasic upwards&r, you'll need the &bBasic to Gold&r (or other level) Upgrade. This will, as you could guess, take a &bBasic Storage&r and bring it directly to &aGold tier&r.
With each tier of upgrades, &ayour storage improves&r. At Gold tier it has &amore slots and an additional upgrade slot&r on the left.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests41.title: Stack Higher
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests41.descr: Your Sophisticated &bBarrels&r and &bChests are capable of &aholding more than a stack per slot&r, if you use the &bStack Upgrades&r on them. The higher the tier, the more stacks each slot can hold.
You can also &ause more than one Stack Upgrade&r, and they will add &amultiplicatively&r!
So if you use a &bTier 1&r and a &bTier 2&r, you will hold 2 stacks by 4 stacks, meaning 8 stacks, or &d512 items per slot&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests42.subti: Pack it up, Pack it in
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests42.descr: &bPacking Tape&r is an incredibly helpful item which can be used to &apackage up a storage block&r for transport. Although &dit can only be used on Sophisticated Storage&r.
You need to &6right click the &bTape&r onto the desired item. Then you can &6break the block&r and it will retain its inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests43.descr: The &bVoid Upgrade&r is an item which will &aremove unwanted items from your storage&r. It will, quite simply, delete them, ensuring that your storage is both well-organized and your server un-crashed. &dIt is especially important to use this upgrade for farms&r!
You can configure it to &adelete only overflow items&r or, if you prefer, &adelete all items of specific type&r.
The &bAdvanced Void Upgrade&r is capable of sorting by NBT and Damage levels.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests44.title: Process Your Inventory
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests44.subti: your storage has a right to due process
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests44.descr: These upgrades will help you &aprocess items in your storage&r, by smelting, blasting, or smoking. The &aautomatic versions&r will do so without the player needing to manually input the items.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests45.descr: The &bFilter Upgrade&r is meant to be used in conjunction with &bPipez&r or other item transport system.
It will &ahelp control what items get placed&r in the storage you use it on.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests46.title: Crafting Upgrades
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests46.descr: The &bCrafting&r and &bStonecutter&r upgrades provide those &acrafting interfaces&r in the storage you place them in.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests47.descr: To &aremotely link Sophisticated Storages&r which are not touching the main network, you need to &6place a &bStorage Link&6 on them&r, and then &6right click the &bStorage Tool&r on the &bLink&r and the &bStorage Controller&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.title: The End
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests0.title: Obtain an End Eye
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests0.subtit: I've got my eye on the End
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests0.descri: Normally, to get to &dThe End&r requires regular old &bEnder Eyes&r, for both seeking and filling the portal frames. However, magic has warped this world, making it more difficult to face the final dimension.
There are, instead, 16 other eyes (of which you need 12), which can be found in various ways. &6See the following quests&r for more information on them.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests1.descri: The first of these new items is called &bThe Old Eye&r, which once belonged to one of the now-extinct Great Sandworms. This sallow eye can be looted from &dDesert Temple&r chests.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests2.descri: The &bNether Eye&r once belonged to a demon, who lost it in a might battle between the Aether and Nether. It can be found in chests inside - you guessed it - &dNether Fortresses&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests3.descri: The &bCold Eye&r once belonged to an Iceologer, and can be found hidden in &dan igloo's hidden basement&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests4.descri: A &bRogue Eye&r can be found in a &dJungle Temple&r, and is rumored to have given our ancestors Redstone.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests5.descri: The &bBlack Eye&r, which once gave sight to the mighty Black Pearl, is now hidden beneath the surface in some &dBuried Treasure&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests6.descri: Starting a &aRaid&r might be the easiest way of obtaining the &bMagical Eye&r, which are used by &eEvokers&r for their powerful properties.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests7.descri: Forged in the time before history began by ancient Blacksmiths, the &bLost Eye&r is said to be found in &dMineshafts&r, deep beneath the crust of the earth.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests8.descri: Rumors swirl about the &bCorrupted Eye&r, of its ability to bring infinite fortune to its owner. However, the greedy king who last owned it faded into obscurity, so perhaps those rumors are just that. Legend has it that it's kept in a &dPillager Tower&r somewhere.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests9.descri: You can perhaps guess where the &bGuardian Eye&r can be located. Beneath the surface of the choppy sea, in the belly of an &eElder Guardian&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests10.descr: To obtain the &bWitch Eye&r, you must first &dslay an evil witch&r and get the &bWitch’s Pupil&r, then craft it together with an &bEnder Eye&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests11.descr: The &bCursed Eye&r is found within the &dTreasure Bastion&r’s chests. It is a powerful, destructive artifact which the Piglins will defend with their lives.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests12.descr: The &bEvil Eye&r is a symbol of protection, staring down the foes of its owner. It can be purchase from a &dMaster Cleric&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests13.descr: This eye is said to be favored by Chosen Undead. The &bUndead Eye&r can be crafted using an &bUndead Soul&r, acquired from killing a &eSkeleton Horse&r, or a large number of &eWraiths&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests14.descr: The &bExotic Eye&r is associated with Atlantis - the legends say that folks used it to find the sunken city, but they never returned to confirm the tale. &6Craft it with aquatic items&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests15.descr: You did it! You beat the game. Congrats, you can all go home now.
...oh, you're staying. Well, hooray! Maybe check out the other quests, since you're here!
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests16.descr: You killed the Dragon twice? Well, my goodness.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests17.title: The Beginning of the End
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests17.descr: You've found your way to &dThe End&r, congratulations. With luck, your journey will continue.
Remember that if you need to explore out over the void, you can do so on your &bBroom&r, or by taming a &eSpace Whale&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests18.descr: You may only need 12 &bEyes&r to pass into &cThe End&r, but if you go above and beyond, and collect all possible eyes, you will be granted a reward.
Once you have &6collected at least 1 of each Eye&r, you may check this button and receive a unique armor set.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests20.title: Getting Ahead in the End
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests20.descr: Swimming in &bEggs&r? That sounds unpleasant. You can &atrade in a &bDragon Egg&r to receive a &bDragon Head&r.
ftbquests.chapter.twilight_forest.title: Twilight Forest
ftbquests.chapter.twilight_forest.quests: Reach the Twilight Forest
Entering a crepuscular zone
Welcome to the Twilight Forest! This dimension can be dangerous to navigate, although it is convieniently laid out with its &amajor landmarks in a grid&r.
The first thing you will want is a &bMap&r, and for that, you'll need to find a &eRaven&r.
And remember! &6If you get lost or wander into an inaccessible zone, look for Kobolds&r. They will be carrying the journal of previous adventurers, which will clue you in to your next goal.
Obtain a Portal Key
Throw it in a limpid pool and then back away

&dThe Twilight Forest&r is a night-ridden dimension filled with mysteries and odd creatures both friendly and hostile. Freely traveling the dimension is difficult - you must conquer each challenge in turn in order to traverse.

To &amake the portal&r, you must &6dig a 3x3x1 (or 2x2x1) hole and fill it with water&r. Then, &6surround the pond with flowers or mushrooms&r. Finally, &6throw a Diamond into the pool&r. Beware, opening a portal can be dangerous!
Find a Forest Raven
Unfortunately, you have to kill it

The &eForest Raven&r is a creature that can often be found near &aObsidian Obelisks&r in the Twilight Forest. It can be &6slain for it's feathers&r, which are important for making the &bMagical Map Focus&r.
Come on, Focus!
Craft a &bMagic Map Focus&r with a &bRaven Feather&r, some &bGlowstone Dust&r, and &bTorchberries&r (which can be found in Twilight Forest caves).
Then you can surround it with &bPaper&r to create a Magic Map, which will prove invaluable to your quest through the &dTwilight Forest&r.
Find a Hedge Maze
Now you can be a Hedge Witch!
One of the features in the Twilight Forest is the &aHedge Maze&r. It is a labyrinth filled with spawners and chests full of loot!
It does not count towards, nor require, any progression through the Forest.
Obtain an Ore Magnet
I'm a total ore magnet

The &bOre Magnet&r can sometimes be found inside &dHollow Hills&r, and when used, will &apull entire veins of ores from the ground&r! Simply &6hold right click while aiming at the ground&r and the ores will be moved up to you!
It can be enchanted with Unbreaking or Mending.
Steel yourself
&bSteeleaf&r is a material which can be used to create pre-enchanted armor that is slightly better than Iron.
Additionally, blocks of Steeleaf will reduce fall damage by 25% when landed on.
Obtain Liveroot
These roots...they're alive!

Break down the &aLiveroots&r beneath a Tree in order to obtain them. This item can be combined with &bIron&r and &bGold&r in order to create &bIronwood&r, which can be used to create pre-enchanted pieces of gear.
Obtain the Peacock Feather Fan
Ostentatious but very useful
The &bPeacock Feather Fan&r is an item which sends out a mighty gust of wind when &6right clicked&r.
You can use this to gain an advantage in combat, or even to give yourself a boost in midair, when jumping or using &bElytra&r!
You might want to sit down for this one

&bThe Moonworm Queen&r is an...item...that is filled with Moonworms. When you &6right click her&r, they will be dispensed - either directly onto a surface, or shot like an arrow. The moonworms serve no purpose other than &aas a light source&r. You can replenish the Queen by crafting her with &bTorchberries&r, and get...even more worms. Yay.
Uncraftables are delicious. Wait...

One of the most valuable items in the game, &bThe Uncrafting Table&r allows you to &arecoup materials from crafted items&r in exchange for experience levels. &6Place the unwanted item in the left slot&r and then &6click one of the ingredients&r in the center to remove it.
Find a Naga Courtyard
Nag your local Naga
The first boss you must face is the block-destroying &eNaga&r. It is a long serpent who slowly shrinks in length as you damage him.
If the player flees the courtyard, the Naga will return to the center.
Once he's defeated, &6be sure to loot the chest that he spawns&r, as you will need the &bNaga Trophy&r inside of it.
Purchase Quest: 20 Naga Scales
A chance to use unwanted scales
Defeat &eNaga&r in the &dTwilight Forest&r to obtain their scales. Then, relinquish those scales in exchange for loot!
Where my liches at?
Inside the &dLich Tower&r is the undead noble of the Twilight Forest. His &aCastle&r is fraught with mobs, but also filled with loot.
It is recommended to be well-geared before attempting this structure.
At the top of the tower, you will find the &eLich&r, who is surrounded by a shield which protects him. &6He must be defeated first with his own magic&r, then martial might can finish the fight.
And beware of the copies he summons during the fight!
Defeating the &eLich&r grants you access to the &dYeti's Lair&r, the &dDark Forest&r, and the &dSwamp&r.
Find a Lich Tower
Unfortunately, no Goblin Kings here...
The Labyrinth, found in the depths of &dthe Swamp&r, houses a number of nasty creatures, culminating in the vicious &eMinotaurs&r and &eMinoshroom&r.
The Minoshroom will drop &bMeef Stroganoff&r, which when eaten, will innoculate you against the curse of the &dFire Swamp&r, allowing you to progress.
Discover the Labyrinth
Keep your charming ways
The &bCharm of Keeping&r sacrifices itself to keep your inventory safe!
The first tier, Bronze, saves your &aheld item&r. Iron saves your &aheld item, and armor&r. Gold preserves &ayour entire inventory&r!
Helpful if you don't want to try to find your way back to your grave, or if you may die in the void.
砍掉一头，长出两个！
The &eHydra&r is a fearsome foe that is only weak in one place: within its fire-spewing maw!

It is best to take on this fight with &a Fire Resistance&r, and make sure you &aim attacks at the Hydra's open mouths&r! You can use a &branged weapon&r, or use a sword to &adeflect their bombs&r back at them.
Once you have defeated the beast, you have completed one task which will let you challenge the Highlands.
Find a Hydra's Lair
Obtain the Mazebreaker
为什么你要破坏一个完美无瑕的迷宫呢？
There is little point trying to mine through the incredibly tough blocks of the Labyrinth. Unless, however, you loot this item: &bThe Mazebreaker&r.
This tool mines Labyrinth blocks faster, and with less durability loss, than any other. It can be looted from the Labyrinth chests.
Purchase Quest: 20 Fiery Blood
A chance to use unwanted blood
Earn yourself some loot by slaying a few Hydras and trading in their blood for a chance at something valuable!
Better bring some extra torches
Located in the gloomy depths of the &dDark Forest&r, the Knight Stronghold is infested with &eGoblins&r, and you cannot enter without one of the &bTrophies&r from the previous bosses.
You can use &bMaze Maps&r here, but the structures are so massive that you may need a number of them.
It is recommended to &6mark your path with torches&r to ensure that you don't double back by mistake.

The end of this dungeon contains a fight against the &eKnight Phantoms&r. These will not follow you out of the room, and can swarm you if you simply charge in. It is recommended to &6retreat out to the hallway periodically if healing is needed&r.
Once you defeat them, you can now challenge the &dDark Tower&r.
Find the Knight Stronghold
Even more charming
The Charm of Life is essentially a Totem of Undying. The unupgraded version gives you 4 hearts and several seconds of Regen.
The upgraded version fully revives you, and grants Regen, Fire Resistance, and Resistance.
I ain't afraid of no ghast
In the Center of the &dDark Forest&r, the Dark Tower can be found. It is a massive structure, filled with monsters, and ruled over by a deadly &eUr-Ghast&r.
There are four smaller turrets, each containing a &bTower Key&r. These keys are used to unlock the central tower. There are many challenges here to undergo, so be prepared for a long expedition.
To defeat the &eUr-Ghast&r, you must defeat his &eCarminite Ghastlings&r in the nearby rooms, near the Ghast Traps. Then and when the beast draws near, activate the trap.
The Ur-Ghast is one of the 3 bosses you must defeat to access the &dHighlands&r.
Find the Dark Tower
Find the Yeti Cave
Are you ready? Not yeti
The Yeti Cave can be found in the Snowy Forest, and houses both &eYetis&r (which are neutral), and the &eAlpha Yeti&r, who is the boss you must face in this area.
Engaging this foe in melee combat can be dangerous, but even at range one must &abeware of falling icicles&r!
His death will grant you access to &dthe Glacier&r.
There's an Elsa joke in here somewhere
The &eSnow Queen&r is found at the top of the &dAurora Palace&r, a treacherous mansion filled with icy monsters and slippery parkour.
The Queen herself has three phases, and cannot be damaged through her &aIce Throne&r, so only her upper body can be targeted.
When she is defeated, you have completed one of three tasks to gain access to &dThe Highlands&r.
Find the Aurora Palace
Finally: The Highlands!
You did it!
You've finally reached the Highlands! This is going to sound suspicious, but hear me out: you need to find some &bMagic Beans&r.
You can obtain some either by killing &eTrolls&r underground, or by looting their obsidian-bound Caches.
Then, find a large patch of &bUberous Soil&r, above which the &eGiants&r live. You'll need to defeat their Miner to obtain his &bGiant Pickaxe&r.
Then, you can &6return underground and use the Giant Pick&r to break open the large Obsidian Vault. It will take a while.
Gain Access to the Final Castle
A thankless task
In the heart of the &cThorns&r lies a castle which holds the final boss - a &epowerful Kobold&r strong enough to &abreak the back of the Warden with ease&r.
However, whether or not to defeat this being is up to you. &aThere is no reward for doing so&r. No accolades. This quest grants you the only thanks you will get.
With that in mind, will you still challenge them?
Defeat the Naga
Defeat a Lich
Defeat the Knight Phantoms
Defeat the Ur-Ghast
Eat Meef Stroganoff
Defeat the Aurora Snow Queen
Complete the Quest Ram
Find yourself a &eQuest Ram&r and you'll notice it seems to be missing something.
Maybe give it some &amore wool&r. Specifically, &6one of each color of wool&r.
Complete the Twilight Forest
Once you complete the &eFinal Castle&r, obtained the &bLamp of Cinders&r, and even &6Completed the &eQuest Ram&r, you will finally have earned this unique armor set. Wear it with pride!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.title: Wildlife
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests0.title: Meet the Cosmaw
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests0.subti: So very Cosmaw-politan, don't you think?
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests0.descr: The &eCosmaw&r is a being which, when tamed, will &arescue its owner from falling into the void&r. It does not defend the player in other ways, however.
It can be &6tamed with Cosmic Cod&r, its natural prey.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests1.title: Meet a Mungus
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests1.descr: The &eMungus&r can be found in Mushroom biomes and is a living meme. It drops &bMungal Spores&r periodically every few days, and this item can be used to breed it.
&bMushrooms&r can be placed upon it, at which point it will target that same type of mushroom and attempt to spawn more of it, or turn it to its giant variant.
A &eMungus&r which has 5 mushrooms on its back will explode when slain, changing the small nearby area to a Mushroom Fields.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests2.title: Create a Bunfungus
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests2.descr: Feed a &eRabbit&r some &bMungal Spores&r to create a &eBunfungus&r, a rather large and disturbing neutral creature which will defend the nearby area. They can be healed with &bCarrots&r, and drop &bBunfungus&r meat, which can be used in cooking.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests3.title: Meet the Mimicube
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests3.descr: The &eMimicube&r is a defender of End Cities, and is capable of mimicking its attacker by developing armor, shields, and even weapons to match those of the player. When defeated, they drop &bMimicream&r, which can be used in crafting, or to &aduplicate almost any item, including enchantments&r!
Simply &6surround the desired item&r with 8 Mimicream, and ta-da! The result will have no durability, but it's a powerful tool nevertheless.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests4.title: Meet a Snuffle!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests4.descr: The &eSnuffle&r is a passive creature with a permanent blep. It can be found in snowy biomes, and &atamed with potatoes&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests5.title: Meet the Quacklings
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests5.descr: Quacklings are bizarre, yet friendly creatures that primarily live in Swamps. They can be traded with, just like human villagers!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests6.descr: The &eGuster&r is an elemental spirit which can appear during storms. It will throw nearby entities or items up into the air, and are &aresistant to arrows&r.

Once defeated, they can drop their &bEyes&r, which can be used either to make a &bPocket of Sand&r, to throw in the face of your enemies - or the &bGustmaker&r, a block which acts as a fan when provided with a Redstone signal.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests7.descr: Earn this by successfully &abreeding two Froststalkers&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests8.descr: The &bFroststalker&r helmet is worn to convince &eFroststalkers&r that the player is one of them.
It must be crafted from one of their horns. Once it is worn, you can &6breed them with pork&r - but be warned, taking off the helmet will &dmake the babies hostile as well&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests9.descr: These can be obtained by &acrafting&r, and are used to &afully tame a &eTusklin&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests10.desc: The &eTusklin&r, found in snowy biomes, can be saddled and ridden wild, but will buck the player off after a while. They can be bred with &bBrown Mushrooms&r, but their young will still be mostly feral.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests11.subt: Just gonna throw my baby at you real quick
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests11.desc: The &eStraddler&r is a bizarre and hostile creature who will throw their young at you to do damage. For the most part, defeating them yields &bBasalt&r, however they can rarely drop &bStraddlite&r.

&bStraddlite&r is a material which can be crafted into a Straddleboard, an enchantable board which can &asurf quickly across lava&r. This is an improvement over the &bObsidian Boat&r due to its speed, enchantability, and ability to jump!
And, as a side note, the &eStradpoles&r can be nabbed in a bucket and also &asurvive in water&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests12.desc: The &eVoid Worm&r is a boss fight which can be summoned by throwing a &bMysterious Worm&r into the void in &dThe End&r. He summons crystalline projectiles, has a devastating bite, and is capable of opening portals.

When defeated, it drops its &bEyes&r and &bBeak&r. These can be crafted into a &bDimensional Carver&r: a pickaxe which can mine a temporary portal through space and to the player's spawn point, and the &bVoid Worm Effigy&r: a trophy that, when provided with redstone signal, chomps down on whatever is in front of it.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests13.subt: I don't give a damn about my reputation
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests13.desc: The &eRocky Roller&r dwells in Dripstone Caves and will roll at its prey to crush them. It is weak but the strong armor on its back will protect it from most blows.

If it drops its &bRocky Hide&r, this can be crafted into a chestplate which allows the player to &aroll into mobs&r and damage them while sprinting. It will also cause the player to &asink in water&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests14.desc: This item seeks out the rarest creature in the world: the &eDevil's Hole Pupfish&r, a creature which spawns only in a single chunk, ever, in a given world.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests15.desc: The &eSkelewag&r is a common mount for &eDrowned&r, and lives near Shipwrecks. It is a fearsome foe, but is worth defeating, as it can drop &bFish Bones&r, which allow the player to craft the &bStrange Fish Finder&r.
The &aSkelewag&r also has an exceptionally small chance at dropping the &bNovelty Hat&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests16.desc: Should one happen upon an &eEndergrade&r - an extremophile living in the void of The End - they can place a saddle on its back. However, in order to control its extremely slow flight, a &bChorus Fruit on a Stick&r is needed.
They can be lured and bred with &bChorus Fruit&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests17.subt: Not to be confused with the delicious cappuchino monkey
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests17.desc: The &eCapuchin Monkey&r is a friendly beast which can be tamed with &bBananas&r, which drop from Jungle Tree Leaves. They can be bred with &bMaggots&r, which drop from &eFlies&r, and healed with &bEggs&r.
These monkeys can also be told to &aperch on your shoulder&r, where they will throw items at your enemies. If you find a rare &bAncient Dart&r, you may give it to them to grant them extra damage.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests18.desc: A saddle which allows the player to ride a &eLavathian&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests19.subt: Much nicer than the other kind of mimic
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests19.desc: The &eMimic Octopus&r is an incredible being that is found in &aWarm Oceans&r. They can be tamed with &bLobster Tails&r, at which point they will follow you and transform to try to scare off any enemies you may encounter.
Give your Octopus an &bInk Sac&r to toggle whether it can randomly change color.
Give it some &bPrismarine Shards&r to give it a Guardian-like appearance.
Give it a &bPufferfish&r if you'd like it to look like one of those, and hmm. I wonder what happens if you give one &bGunpowder&r?
Feed it some &bMimicream&r to teach it the abilities of whatever creature you've given it!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests20.subt: Not to be confused with lavasioth
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests20.desc: These beasts cannot be tamed, but they can be ridden.
Place a &bStraddlite Saddle&r and &bStraddlite Pack&r on their backs, and up to 4 players can ride these massive creatures.
They can be placed in water to &aharden into an obsidian variant&r, and can be &ahealed&r with &bMagma Cream&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests21.desc: The &eSpectre&r is a ghostly creature that dwells in The End. It can be lured in with a &bSoul Heart&r (obtained from Vultures in the Nether), and leashed with a Lead, then ridden like a balloon.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests22.desc: The &eFlutter&r is a passive mob which loves flowers.
It can be tamed if given some, but &deach flower must be a different type&r or it won't accept them.
It will defend its owner if told to follow - and can be given a &bFlower Pot&r to rest in. &6Shift click the potted Flutter&r to pick it up for transport.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests23.subt: Jellyfish in the sky~ I can go twice as high~
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests23.desc: Defeat a &eRainbow Jelly&r to obtain a drop which can craft &bRainbow Glass&r. You can also &6right click it onto an entity&r to paint that entity rainbow. Wipe them clean with a sponge, if you wish.
I wonder what would happen if you ate it?
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests24.titl: The Rarest Fish in the World
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests24.desc: The &aDevil's Hole Pupfish&r is the rarest being in the world, spawning in only a single chunk - EVER - in any given world.
Find one with a &bStrange Fish Locator&r. Or, you know, get extremely lucky.
The ponds they spawn in are usually underground. These fish love to nibble on &bMoss Blocks&r, and will sometimes breed after doing so!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests25.desc: &eCatfish&r, which come in three different size categories, will habitually &aswallow up dropped items or smaller entities&r they come across.
However, if they take any damage - or encounter a sea pickle, which they loathe - &athey will eject the contents of their stomachs&r.
One can &6lure them in&r with a &bSea Lantern&r, and grab them with a &bBucket&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests26.subt: You have an appointment with Moby Dick
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests26.desc: The &aCachalot whale&r, more commonly called Sperm whale, is a massive creature that dwells in &aLukewarm, Cold, or Deep Oceans&r.
Sometimes they &abecome beached&r during storms, and if you were to &6push one back out to sea&r it may thank you with a gift of &bAmbergris&r.
It likes to prey on &eGiant Squid&r, and will sometimes drop one of its teeth during a hunt.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests27.desc: &eRanchu Goldfish&r are a chubby fish that love to eat &bWater Lettuce&r, which can be used to breed them.
There are &aover 300 variants&r of the Ranchu Goldfish!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests28.desc: Defeat a &eRocky Roller&r and obtain its shell, plus get this little bonus!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests29.desc: While some &eElephants&r are large and occasionally aggressive, there are variants which are &asmall and friendly&r. These &eElephants&r can be &6tamed with &bPeanuts&r, and will &ahelp you water your gardens&r!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests30.subt: Hummingbirds are the sharks of the sky
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests30.desc: &eHummingbirds&r are tiny birds which pollinate nearby plants.
You can attract them using a &bHummingbird Feeder&r filled with &bWater&r and &bSugar&r,
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests31.desc: This delightful item not only &aplays a lovely tune&r when you &6hold right click while holding it&r, but it also &asummons all non-sitting pets nearby&r to your location.
You can optionally bind your flute to a specific pet by &6shift right clicking&r on the animal with the flute.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests32.desc: Gain this advancement by taming and befriending an animal!

Using the reward from this quest, you can right click to place an entity in your inventory so you can easily move them large distances. Simply &6right click the Mob Cage on the animal, and then right click it on a block&r to place the animal down again.
You can also &6shift right click&r to place it&r! It's totally normal to put your best friends in cages.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests33.subt: Animal husbandry is different than the name sounds
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests33.desc: Find two animals and breed them in order to get this advancement and begin these quests!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests34.titl: Get an Apple for your Straw Golem
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests34.desc: &eStraw Golems&r get hungy! If they don't get a delicious apple-y snack every day or so, they slow down to a snail's pace, and eventually &asit and pout until fed&r. They adore bright, shiny, red &bApples&r, and will follow you if you are holding one!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests35.desc: 想要一些帮手帮忙收获你的作物吗？你很幸运，因为你的魔法能够创造生命！小不点&e稻草傀儡&r将帮你收获你的作物。
尽管听起来稻草傀儡是由稻草制成的，但事实上构成它们的是干草而不是稻草。所以你要弄一个&b干草块&r和一个&b雕刻过的南瓜&r来创造出这些新朋友们！&6放下干草块，然后将雕刻南瓜放在干草块上面&r，这样你就能看着它焕发生机了。
帽子突出了傀儡的可爱。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests36.titl: 给你的稻草傀儡一个帽子
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests36.desc: 帽子纯粹是装饰性的。伙计，它真的可爱过吗？
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests37.titl: 给你的稻草傀儡用一些小麦延寿
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests37.desc: &e稻草傀儡&r是一种脆弱且需要手动延长寿命和喂食的小家伙。
它们会随时间衰弱，也会受到其他来源的伤害，例如&a饥肠辘辘的家畜&r和&a雨&r。&6使用小麦右击&r它们来治愈它们。
默认地，稻草傀儡仅仅只能存活7天（游戏中时间）。你可以&a使用小麦延长它们的寿命%r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests38.desc: &b命令鼓&r是一个允许你一次性命令多个驯服的生物的道具。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests39.desc: 如果你的宠物身上发生了什么令人不愉快的事，&b宠物床&r允许它们在早晨&a重生&r，只要把你的宠物推上&b宠物床&r，就能&6设置它们的重生点&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests40.desc: &b项圈&r可以用来为你的宠物命名，但项圈也可以通过被&a附魔&r来给你的宠物提供特殊能力。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests41.desc: &b宠物契约&r是一个用于&a多人模式&r的物品。你可以使用它&6右击动物&r，然后将&b契约&r交给你的朋友，当他们使用时，&a如果他们已经自行驯服过了&r，宠物将从属于他们。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests42.desc: The &bWayward Lantern&r will allow any lost pets to &afind their way home&r. Place it near your base, and if you should lose your pet while exploring, watch for them there.
If you &alose your pet in another dimension&r, you will need to &6place a Lantern in that dimension&r to get them back.
In &dMultiplayer&r, your pets will respawn at the &aclosest Lantern&r, so be careful in other people's areas.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests43.desc: The &bRascal&r is a lonely creature who dwells in &cMineshafts below y 0&r! What it spends its days doing is a mystery, but one thing is clear: it wants to play!
If you can &6find the same &eRascal&6 3 times within 15 minutes&r, it will give you a small reward as thanks.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests45.desc: Find an &eIceologer&r during a raid or in his secluded home. And then murder him. Because frankly, he deserves it.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests47.desc: 虽然并非所有的&e苦力怕&r都是敌对的，但如果你能击杀每一种苦力怕，那简直太酷了！就像一次世界旅行，十步杀一怕，千里不留行。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests49.desc: 如果你能成功击杀500个&e苦力怕&r，那么你将获得这个&b苦力怕刷怪蛋&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests51.desc: Defeat the &eIllusioner&r - if you can find him - and obtain his riches!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests52.desc: Defeat a horde of &eEndermen&r, take their SKIN and WEAR IT - oh, was that too much? Sorry. I got excited.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests53.desc: If you manage to defeat 500 &eWither Skeletons&r, then you deserve this reward: a &bWither Skeleton Spawn Egg&r, and a &bSpawner&r to put it in.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests58.desc: Prove your mettle by killing...wait, just one &ezombie&r and one &eskeleton&r? That seems pretty easy...
Maybe the next quests will be more difficult.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests60.desc: He's just a good boi. Don't let him stay out in the sun too long.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests62.desc: Raccoons are adorable but mischeivous nocturnal creatures which will &abeg you for food&r if you happen to be holding some.
They can also &asteal food out of your storage&r, so be careful when building in the wilds!
They can be &atamed by giving it an &bEgg&r and letting it wash it.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests63.desc: It's time to play &aGoat in a Boat&r! The rules are simple:
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests64.desc: Axolotls are cute lil guys, but they're also &astrong&r and &avicious&r. If you tame one, it will &afight alongside you&r should you decide to take on an underwater threat.
They'll also sometimes &agive you Regeneration&r, and once they do so, you'll know that you are &dbest friends 5ever&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests65.desc: &eTadpoles&r, otherwise known as \"the forbidden boba,\" are cute lil wiggly fellas who are particularly susceptible to &eAxolotls&r.
They're also susceptible to &bBuckets&r, and if you should capture one in such a way, then you've completed this quest.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests66.desc: The &eSlabfish&r is a rectangular entity which can be &atamed&r with &bTropical Fish&r.
Once tamed, you can &6right click&r to &agive them a sweater&r by equipping them with &bWool&r. They can also help you carry items if you &agive them a &bChest&r.
You can also &adye the chest backpack&r by placing a dye in that slot.
&eSlabfish&r will toggle sitting or standing if you &6shift right click&r them.
However, they will &donly follow you when you're holding &bTropical Fish&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests67.desc: Looking for a challenge? Why not craft yourself a &bGate Pearl&r? &dYou can craft any one you'd like for this quest&r.
A &bGate Pearl&r allows you to summon a &eGateway&r by using it on a block.There will need to be &asufficient space&r available, and &aanother Gateway cannot already be open&r.

An open Gateway will &dfail in a burst of lightning&r if it &acannot spawn a mob&r, any active &amob gets too far away&r, or the &awave timer&r elapses. Rewards will spawn from the Gateway as they are obtained.
These &eGateway&r provide a challenge for powerful players, and are a great source of &bMob Drops&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests68.desc: &e山羊&r是一种暴躁的生物。如果你偶然遇见一只，&a要小心它们的火箭头槌&r！
然而，如果你能让它&a撞到一个硬质方块&r，如&b石头&r，它就会掉落一个&b角&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests69.desc: Although &eWraiths&r are not hostile, they sure are spooky. Put 50 of them &aout of their misery&r to earn this ingredient in crafting the &bUndead Eye&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests70.desc: The &bDimensional Carver&r is an item which can &atear through space&r to teleport you to &cyour spawn point&r. Aim it at the air and &6hold right click&r to use. Be aware that this is &dsomewhat unstable&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests71.desc: You can obtain the &bShattered Dimensional Carver&r by &aplacing a Dimensional Carver inside a &bCapsid block&r.
It will then slowly break down the Carver without untethering its pieces from one another. This is &astrange, very old magic&r.
The &bShattered Dimensional Carver&r can be used to teleport 1 million blocks in whichever direction you're facing. &aNormally one must do this 30 times&r to access the Farseers.
However, this is &dboth buggy and very hard on servers&r, so we recommend &dnot using the Carver as intended&r.
Instead, use it to craft a &bFarseer Gate Pearl&r, an item which brings all the luxury and delight of fighting &eFarseers&r, right to your doorstep!
